programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Caseys bull speeds downstream, out of sight. Anticipation rises as they round the bend. Chris spots it washed up near white water on a gravel flat.

programme.title: OLD and NEW FACES
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Bottom Feeders S1 - "OLD and NEW FACES"
programme.desc: Rick Johnson returns to fishing alone after spending three weeks with Jedds crew. Two new faces join Bottom Feeders: commercial fisherman and fish market owner, Jeff and his friend Steve.

programme.title: The Gift of Inspiration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Inspiration"
programme.desc: Leon finds refuge in the world’s toughest city, works his way across the Atlantic aboard a cargo ship. A Spanish customs issue threatens to derail his journey, and the music of two African musicians in southern France, inspires his next gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Transformation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Transformation"
programme.desc: After striking out in St. Tropez, and getting lost in the Italian countryside, Leon finds shelter in 18th Century villa outside Torino, but his luck runs out on the shores of Lake Como.

programme.title: Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan"
programme.desc: In this episode the brothers shun the more famous areas, Tokyo and Kyoto, and head to the isolated, ancient island of Shikoku. Their route is the ancient 88 Temple Zen pilgrimage circuit.

programme.title: Cape Breton Island, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Cape Breton Island, Canada"
programme.desc: By pick-up truck, the brothers route is the culturally and geographically rich island of Cape Breton and the Cabot Trail. Lobster fishing, hooking, moose sightings, Bingo, Scottish ceilidhs, Mikmaq drum session, its all happening in this episode.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: Kay Nambiar and the team investigate paranormal activity in London’s Ragged School and abandoned Woolwich Arsenal.

programme.title: Hastings
programme.desc: The team investigate paranormal activity in Hastings where Ian Lawman makes contact with the spirit of the notorious devil worshipper Aleister Crowley.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped S1 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: With lifted spirits, the Keefer brothers set out to spot and stalk a herd of caribou near by, but closing in proves more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Cache Out
programme.desc: With red meat, the Keefer brothers are finally able to replenish their depleted energy, but they arent the only ones looking to survive the winter in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Bearing Down
programme.desc: The harsh reality of winter sets in, and the Keefer brothers are forced to sleep with one eye open as a grizzly patrols the area around their camp.

programme.title: Heartbreak Tuna Capetown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Heartbreak Tuna Capetown"
programme.desc: When two oceans collide, there is mayhem on the horizon. On this episode Mario ventures off the coast of Cape Town where the Indian ocean meets the Atlantic.

programme.title: Getting Close to Black Death
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Getting Close to Black Death"
programme.desc: Deep in the wilderness of Northern South Africa, poaching is rife, and the wilderness is as dangerous as it gets. Mario attempts to be the first person in the area to have ever harvested one of the most dangerous animals known to Africa.

programme.title: Hawaii Access - Shane Dorian
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Hawaii Access - Shane Dorian"
programme.desc: The Axis deer populations in Hawaii have reached plague proportions and they are in-fact invasive to this beautifully pristine archipelago of the pacific. Luckily for Mario these deer also happen to boast the best tasting venison.

programme.title: Meet the Press
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Meet the Press"
programme.desc: The official press launch of The Flying Kestrel at legendary racetrack, Santa Pod. The Kestrel team is joined by Victor Riley of Riley Cars, and celebrity Rachel Riley.

programme.title: Head to Head
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Dropped S1 - "Head to Head"
programme.desc: With the arctic storm nipping at their heals, the Keefer brothers race down the river to reach their next supply-yielding cache only to become lost as the river divides into a maze of small channels.

programme.title: Edge of the Storm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped S1 - "Edge of the Storm"
programme.desc: As the temperature plummets, the Keefer brothers fight their way down stream through freezing water and strong headwinds as they hope to reach their extraction site before the arctic storm lays claim to it.

programme.title: After the Drop
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Dropped S1 - "After the Drop"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer recount their most memorable moments from this years journey to Alaska’s Brooks Range.

programme.title: Into the Unknown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Dropped S2 - "Into the Unknown"
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are dropped in the wilderness of New Zealand with virtually nothing. They must quickly adapt to their new environment or face life threatening consequences.

programme.title: The Ice-Trey 200
programme.sub-title: S16 : E12 Graveyard Carz S16 - "The Ice-Trey 200"
programme.desc: To celebrate the 200th episode of Graveyard Carz, Mark and the Ghoulz visit a private automotive museum!

programme.title: Phoenix Rising
programme.sub-title: S16 : E13 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Phoenix Rising"
programme.desc: Graveyard Carz was born of struggle, challenge, and the dream of resurrecting an impossible car–the legendary Phantom ‘Cuda!

programme.title: The Road Running Home
programme.sub-title: S17 : E01 Graveyard Carz S17 - "The Road Running Home"
programme.desc: Good news from Mark’s daughter Allyssa! She’s pregnant with her fourth child, and this time Mark will have a grandson! Unfortunately, Mark needs to find a replacement to help with his pet project, “The Autopsy Report”.

programme.title: India
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Chasing the Sun S2 - "India"
programme.desc: From an indie musician in Mumbai to a skate community rallying together to help local children, Stephen finds the personal stories of art and perseverance in a community of 1.3 billion people.

programme.title: Malaysia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Malaysia"
programme.desc: Where else can you find a beach full of cats after shopping in a vintage vinyl store in the art of the city or watch a shadow puppet show after having a home cooked meal prepared by two entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Taiwan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Taiwan"
programme.desc: From Urban bustle to tranquil beaches, Taiwan has a soul and culture all its own. creativity abounds in its people, not to mention some of the greatest vegan food in the world.

programme.title: Getting to Know Rick OShea
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "Getting to Know Rick OShea"
programme.desc: In this episode we get know Larry’s friend Rick O’Shea (Ricochet). Terry and Larry test several different films where bullets are manipulated in order to get an amazing result. They test scenes from Skyfall, Suicide Squad, American Ultra, and The Bear.

programme.title: Larrys Shadow
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "Larrys Shadow"
programme.desc: Larry gets sucked into Terry’s dark and mysterious world because Terry wants to test 2 scenes from the 1994 film with Alec Baldwin, The Shadow. Terry will find out if they can save a man trapped in cement shoes, and then they will do a seemly impossible test.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Head to Head
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Dropped S1 - "Head to Head"
programme.desc: With the arctic storm nipping at their heals, the Keefer brothers race down the river to reach their next supply-yielding cache only to become lost as the river divides into a maze of small channels.

programme.title: Edge of the Storm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped S1 - "Edge of the Storm"
programme.desc: As the temperature plummets, the Keefer brothers fight their way down stream through freezing water and strong headwinds as they hope to reach their extraction site before the arctic storm lays claim to it.

programme.title: After the Drop
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Dropped S1 - "After the Drop"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer recount their most memorable moments from this years journey to Alaska’s Brooks Range.

programme.title: Into the Unknown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Dropped S2 - "Into the Unknown"
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are dropped in the wilderness of New Zealand with virtually nothing. They must quickly adapt to their new environment or face life threatening consequences.

programme.title: Mongolia
programme.desc: There is nothing on earth that compares to Mongolia. Here the last nomadic people range their livestock over millions of acres of grasslands. Drinking fermented mare’s milk (worst tasting drink ever), riding a yak and finding the original wild horses

programme.title: North Pole
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel Quest S1 - "North Pole"
programme.desc: The crew takes an icebreaker to the North Pole just in time to make a satellite phone call to wish Bills mother a happy birthday (she is so shocked she doesnt recognize him). We also track and film the biggest predators on earth…polar bears.

programme.title: Rwanda…Gorillas
programme.desc: Bill tracks through never ending mud, heavy vegetation and steep mountains, to come face-to-face with our mighty cousins. He also traces the life, and finds the remnants, of the camp of one of his idols - Diane Fossey.

programme.title: Separate Riders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Roads End S1 - "Separate Riders"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave’s patience are pushed to the limits as the whole trip hangs in the balance of Rob’s broken clutch. Will they have to buy a new bike?

programme.title: San Juan to Laguna Brava
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Roads End S1 - "San Juan to Laguna Brava"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave put the drama of Rob’s broken clutch behind them and go full steam ahead from San Juan to Laguna Brava.

programme.title: Salt Flats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Roads End S1 - "Salt Flats"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are continuing on through the stunning scenery of Laguna Brava towards Corona del Inca. That’s not all they’ve got in store though.

programme.title: The Berg River
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Berg River"
programme.desc: While Xander gets an up-close look at the tranquil and isolated Kersefontein Farm, Adam becomes a true armchair adventurer, wishing he was experiencing anything besides snowy Canadian weather.

programme.title: The Majestic Cederberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Majestic Cederberg"
programme.desc: When Adam’s power goes out in Winnipeg, he decides to spend the day building a snow fort. Meanwhile, Xander and his crew take a trip through Cederberg.

programme.title: From Elands to Lamberts Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Elands to Lamberts Bay"
programme.desc: Up next, Xander and his team stop to surf the legendary left break at Elands Bay. After experiencing the peace and tranquility of the ocean with South African locals, Xander and his team hit a snag in their journey.

programme.title: England Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 The Travel Bug S3 - "England Part 1"
programme.desc: Morgan heads to the United Kingdom and starts his journey in London.He’s going to take in all the cliched sites and iconic locales and most importantly,hell dig a little deeper to find some new experiences that tell the story of this amazing city

programme.title: England Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 The Travel Bug S3 - "England Part 2"
programme.desc: Morgan searches for a bit of England’s history as he continues his UK adventure. In Manchester he visits the world’s most popular football team and learns a little about the industrial revolution, before discovering the remarkable Lake District.

programme.title: Crying Shame
programme.desc: Region 5 Warden Nick Taylor is in the crosshairs when a hunter points a gun directly at him. And in Region 2 Wardens find a huntress with a secret she is hiding.

programme.title: Illegal Possession
programme.desc: Region 3 Wardens chase down a check station runner only to find the hunters have shot a deer – but what and where is the question?

programme.title: The Skeleton
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Skeleton"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Pieterjan and Alexandra from Belgium and Sylvia and Dacian from Romania. Who keeps it cool? Which of these couples will escape the castle?

programme.title: The Skull
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Skull"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Silka and Dylan from Australia and Jonna and Aleksi from Sweden. Which of these couples will escape the castle?

programme.title: Beach Run
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Beach Run"
programme.desc: More and more injuries effect the several teams. Will everybody stay in competition?

programme.title: End of the Road
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Extreme Iceland S1 - "End of the Road"
programme.desc: Mike Wilson’s epic adventure in Iceland is almost over, but he has plans to end on a high: base jumping over the Solheimajokull glacier.

programme.title: Mumbai
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "Mumbai"
programme.desc: Pete Heat in Manchester and visits Old Trafford and for his finale; he wows a group of friends with his unique and comedic magic skills.

programme.title: Paris and Barcelona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "Paris and Barcelona"
programme.desc: Bones introduce his trademark trickery to people in Paris and Barcelona, performing mind reading and an attempt to escape a straitjacket while breakdancing.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "London"
programme.desc: In this episode Bones is back in his home city, London where he stuns locals with his mind reading, card trickery and disappearing skills.

programme.title: WE ARE BOTTOM FEEDERS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bottom Feeders S1 - "WE ARE BOTTOM FEEDERS"
programme.desc: Jedd is tough on his crew while fishing is tough out on the water. Mike and his brother try their luck in the icy waters of Wisconsin, and the fishing has been rough for Tim and his crew.

programme.title: Final
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Final"
programme.desc: The three finalists cook off over two rounds. First, a live fire challenge where they must prepare a whole lamb asado style, next, a barbecue degustation to impress legendary chef Al Brown.

programme.title: The Gift of Abundance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Abundance"
programme.desc: After catching some waves in Zagreb and touring the turbulent history of Sarajevo, Leon and Kindness One® make it to Montenegro, where a kind farmer whose family has been tilling the same land for 20 generations inspires his next surprise gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Service
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Service"
programme.desc: In Kosovo, Leon meets a Muslim woman who dreams of peace, and some bike trouble in Greece opens the door for adventure. Finally, some high-altitude hospitality in Turkey inspires his next surprise gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Tomorrow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Tomorrow"
programme.desc: Leon receives an honored blessing on his journey. In Ephesus, Leon walks in the footsteps of Apostle Paul, before escalating Middle-East conflicts threaten his journey.

programme.title: Volcan Madera, Nicaragua
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Volcan Madera, Nicaragua"
programme.desc: The brothers attain their goal of riding motorcycles to the heart of Nicaragua, through the jungle to the isolated beaches of the Pacific coast and back inland: through Spanish-colonial towns, local villages and the huge volcanic island of Ometepe.

programme.title: Yorkshire Dales, England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Yorkshire Dales, England"
programme.desc: Imagine a 26-pub, 7-day, 60-mile pub-crawl! Doing a traditional ‘ramble’ through the stunning Yorkshire Dales region of northern England, the brother’s stride through the moors and dales and peaks and valleys - legs and livers intact.

programme.title: Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco"
programme.desc: From Marrakesh, the brothers take a series of local Berber taxis over the High Atlas Mountains and down into the Draa Valley until the road ends at the edge of the great sand sea of the Sahara where they bury some treasure.

programme.title: Banff and Lake Louise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Trails S1 - "Banff and Lake Louise"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes heli hiking and caving while exploring Canada’s first and most popular National Park and neighboring Lake Louise.

programme.title: Australia’s Northern Territory
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Trails S1 - "Australia’s Northern Territory"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under to explore the Larapinta Trail and Kakadu National Park.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes off the beaten path as he hikes from one remote village to the next through Fiji’s mountainous landscape.

programme.title: Talking Turkey - Frank Stallone
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Talking Turkey - Frank Stallone"
programme.desc: Mario links up with Frank Stallone and ventures off to Kansas in search of Eastern turkeys.

programme.title: Backcountry Ice Man - Chuck Lidell
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Backcountry Ice Man - Chuck Lidell"
programme.desc: Former UFC Lightweight Champion and Hall of Famer Chuck Liddell and Mario take on the mountain tops of Idaho on horseback. The two are on a search for a mysterious piece of protein.

programme.title: 1,000 Tuna Quest
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Man Eats Wild S2 - "1,000 Tuna Quest"
programme.desc: Mario travels to the outer limits of the Eastern Coast of Canada to a place called Prince Edward Island. Home to some of the biggest bluefin tuna on the planet, these fish can grow up to 1,000 pounds.

programme.title: Harwich
programme.desc: Kay Nambiar and the team are in Harwich, South East England to investigate a pair of haunted lighthouses capturing ghostly orbs on their CCTV cameras.

programme.title: Flight of the Super Bee
programme.sub-title: S17 : E02 Graveyard Carz S17 - "Flight of the Super Bee"
programme.desc: Mark and the Ghouls race to finish a one owner 1970 Super Bee that belongs to a decorated retired Marine. But as Mark and Justin forge ahead on this one owner car, a SNAFU on Wills side of the shop may cause a total mission failure.

programme.title: Final
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Final"
programme.desc: The three finalists cook off over two rounds. First, a live fire challenge where they must prepare a whole lamb asado style, next, a barbecue degustation to impress legendary chef Al Brown.

programme.title: We Hear Ya!
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "We Hear Ya!"
programme.desc: Larry and Terry test several requests from viewers. They will test a bunch of crazy scenes from Bad Boys 2, Under Siege, A LIcense to Kill, and Bangkok Dangerous.

programme.title: D-Day By Air
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "D-Day By Air"
programme.desc: Terry goes back to paratrooper school and will see how difficult it was for soldiers engaging the enemy while parachuting down to safety on D-Day. He will attempt with 3 different weapons to hit several targets while descending from the air.

programme.title: Saving Private Terry
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "Saving Private Terry"
programme.desc: Terry gets to relive part of his military carrier by attempting the famous sniper shot from Saving Private Ryan, and Larry and Terry demonstrate how sniper technology has developed over the years and test some amazing sniper shots.

programme.title: The Lake
programme.desc: Both teams have proven to be equally strong. How will the red team perform without ‘motherly’ Erika? And will team bonding continue in the blue team?

programme.title: The Barricades
programme.desc: From five team members to four, this time. The teams have to follow a track through an industrial area. Ionut describes it as Very heavy.

programme.title: The Pain
programme.desc: The teams are now facing probably the most difficult elimination, set on the Mediterranean coast. Who has to go, with the finale luring?

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Dangers of Dark Fest S2 - "Episode 2"
programme.desc: In this episode we discover the fanaticism of the riders. How do they achieve their success during such a dangerous event? The answer turns out to be friendship.

programme.title: Botswana
programme.desc: Botswana is a wildlife lover’s dream with massive herds of elephants, immense pods of hippos and some of the largest prides of lions anywhere. It’s also the home of Victoria Falls…the largest falls in the world.

programme.title: Abandoned Village
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads End S1 - "Abandoned Village"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave embrace their adventurous sides when they abandon the plan to take the safe route and instead take on what could be their most challenging riding.

programme.title: Fiambala
programme.desc: In this episode, Rob and Dave drive through Fiambala and decide to stop at the town’s most famous site the naturally occurring hot springs baths.

programme.title: Wild Paternoster
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Wild Paternoster"
programme.desc: Adam and Xander go on fishing trips on opposite sides of the globe; one in a winter wonderland and the other in Paternoster, an old South African fishing village.

programme.title: Kraalbaai Caribbean
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Kraalbaai Caribbean"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team experience the joys of wakeboarding in the beautiful Kraalbaai Caribbean, Adam attempts to replicate this experience.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Antarctica"
programme.desc: Jonathan caps off the season with an expedition into the spirit of isolation; a journey that takes him from Arunchal pradesh, India, to Dolomites in Italy, to all the way down in Antarctica

programme.title: Mexico: Tequila: Does it need to come from certain regions of Mexico?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Mexico: Tequila: Does it need to come from certain regions of Mexico?"
programme.desc: In the land of tequila, Liesel gets the skinny on the premium export of Jalisco, blue agave tequila. From harvesting agave with the legendary jimadores, to understanding the process of distillation, Liesel is on the hunt to appreciate and understand the production requirements of this spirit that makes it what it is. Are they worth it only if they’re from Jalisco or can they be made somewhere else for cheaper and better..? Liesel finds out!

programme.title: Los Angeles: Food trucks: are they any good?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Los Angeles: Food trucks: are they any good?"
programme.desc: It’s a well known fact that Los Angeles is the trendsetter for entertainment, fashion, and outlandish celebrity exploits. But is it the same story with the food? Liesel explores the food truck bubble to figure out what started the craze, why its so popular, and more importantly, is the food any good?

programme.title: CAPE TOWN and BLUE MOUNTAINS
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Travel in Style S2 - "CAPE TOWN and BLUE MOUNTAINS"
programme.desc: In the episode we visit the Mother City of South Africa – Cape Town. The second half of the show is based in the distinctive blue haze of the Blue Mountains, Australia.

programme.title: BANGKOK and NEW YORK
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Travel in Style S2 - "BANGKOK and NEW YORK"
programme.desc: We visit floating Markets, Royal Palaces and the new spa and sauna of the Peninsula Hotel in Bangkok. Then it’s off to the city thats so good they named it twice… New York!

programme.title: Slovenia - Eastern
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wonders Of... S1 - "Slovenia - Eastern"
programme.desc: On Wonders of Slovenia, a city settled during the Stone Age, holds the countries oldest traditions, and liquid library, including former Yugoslavian President Tito’s priceless favorite. Ashley takes a journey through the Middle Ages.

programme.title: Slovenia - Central
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wonders Of... S1 - "Slovenia - Central"
programme.desc: The capital city of Slovenia is the heart of the country and one of the most picturesque cities in the world. Just a 45-minute drive north lies one of the most beautiful places in the world, Lake Bled.

programme.title: Ho Chi Minh City
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Ho Chi Minh City"
programme.desc: Carolyne indulges in some of the incredible delicacies Lyon, France has to offer. Lynton visits some extraordinarily iconic monuments in Delhi, India. Scotty explores the cultural food and history that Vietnam’s Ho Chi Minh City has to offer.

programme.title: Taj Mahal
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Taj Mahal"
programme.desc: Lynton visits one of the most iconic buildings in the world, the Taj Mahal. Carolyne checks out what makes Singapore a hot listed destination. Susannah goes on a feeding frenzy in Phuket. Scotty samples street food in Hanoi.

programme.title: Shaoxing
programme.desc: Join host Tianran He in the historic water town of Shaoxing, famed for its yellow wine. Traversing its canals by boat, Tianran discovers why its said there are 10,000 bridges in Shaoxing.

programme.title: Family Home
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Family Home"
programme.desc: Vipin Kakkars a successful businessman and his family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the GTA. Real Estate Agents Debbie Domingues and Mike Donia are challenged to find the perfect home that caters everyones needs.

programme.title: House of Dreams
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "House of Dreams"
programme.desc: Phil and Claire, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore. Mortgage Broker, Paul Meredith advises in the investment options for the couple, as well as possibilities for amortgage.

programme.title: City Escape - Miami
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Big Little Footprints S1 - "City Escape - Miami"
programme.desc: To educate our children about the profound impact of travel we travel to Miami, Florida. Well learn about the areas colorful history, taste test its cuisine, learn Latin dancing and experience an epic adventure through the everglades.

programme.title: Eco-Explore Your Backyard - California Coast to Santa Barbara
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Eco-Explore Your Backyard - California Coast to Santa Barbara"
programme.desc: In this episode we remind viewers just how much you can find when exploring your own backyard by road tripping the California Coast to Santa Barbara! Swapping TV time to chats around the campfire and an exciting encounter with sea lions.

programme.title: Big Resort, Big Heart - Atlantis Bahamas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Big Resort, Big Heart - Atlantis Bahamas"
programme.desc: If the Atlantis Bahamas isn’t on your familys bucket list - it should be! We’ll show you why as each family member ticks off their dream adventure that also gives back. Proving this big resort has an even bigger heart.

programme.title: Tahiti
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Travel Bug S1 - "Tahiti"
programme.desc: Often considered the jewel of the Pacific, Tahiti has some of the world’s most amazing beaches and aquatic life. But beyond the appeal of the warm ocean and colourful reefs are the contrasting influences of Polynesian Islanders and the French.

programme.title: Papua New Guinea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Travel Bug S1 - "Papua New Guinea"
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea is a diverse and dramatic landscape. The mostly untouched landscapes of this beautiful nation and the friendly people that inhabit it make it the perfect location for holidaymakers with adventure in their blood.

programme.title: Japan, Part I
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Travel Bug S1 - "Japan, Part I"
programme.desc: Japan is a land of extremes, where sprawling cities and bright lights give way to snow-capped mountains and rice patties. Delve beneath the surface and escape to the little-explored parts of the country.

programme.title: Seattle
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Seattle"
programme.desc: Denella visits the Emerald City, Seattle. This gateway city is known for its award winning airport and cruise port.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Alaska"
programme.desc: Denella visits Anchorage, Alaska, where its a bit urban and wild.

programme.title: Disney Cruise Line
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Disney Cruise Line"
programme.desc: Sail away with Denella on board the Disney Dream. Who says Disney Cruise Line is just for kids?

programme.title: Karphatos and Kasos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Karphatos and Kasos"
programme.desc: In the last episode Peter started his time on Karpathos. He had never been to this huge Island so naturally was keen to see as much as he could.

programme.title: Rhodes
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Rhodes"
programme.desc: In this episode weve arrived on the Island of the Knights Rhodes. Its one of the most well-known destinations in the world and its easy to see why.

programme.title: Kastellorizo
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Kastellorizo"
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series Peter is leaving the largest island in the group Rhodes and heading east to one of the smallest Kastellorizo.

programme.title: BARBADOS and LAOS
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Travel in Style S2 - "BARBADOS and LAOS"
programme.desc: Its all fun in the sun in this reggae soaked jewel of the Caribbean - Barbados. Then our ‘Travel in Style’ crew jet across to Luang Prabang a region in the mysterious landlocked country of Lao in Southeast Asia.

programme.title: ROME and BERKSHIRE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Travel in Style S2 - "ROME and BERKSHIRE"
programme.desc: we go to the tranquil quaint English countryside of Berkshire to find something of a wonderful enigma. Then a short two hour flight to Italy our crew visits Rome.

programme.title: ASCOT and DUBAI
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Travel in Style S2 - "ASCOT and DUBAI"
programme.desc: We visit one of the newest cities in the world – Dubai. We discover have an absolute gem tucked away near Ascot in the English countryside.

programme.title: India’s Natural Beauties: Udaipur and Jaipur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Journeys in India S1 - "India’s Natural Beauties: Udaipur and Jaipur"
programme.desc: While traveling by boat, we visit the many palaces and temples on the shore. We also tour the majestic City Palace and the Garden of the Maids of Honor. In Jaipur, we tour the Pink City, seeing treasures as the Palace of Winds and the Amber Fort.

programme.title: Ultimate Luxury
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Ultimate Luxury"
programme.desc: Real Estate Agent Laura Arci Compagni helps two homeowners looking for the perfect investment. They are interested in unique investment opportunities such as units in a condo or hotel, and Laura is up to the challenge.

programme.title: Modern Resident
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Modern Resident"
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren’t busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children. They have worked hard for years, and are finally ready to buy their dream home.

programme.title: Mediterranean Scuba
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Mediterranean Scuba"
programme.desc: A British family faces local resistance while opening a business in the Spanish desert. Scuba divers search for a century-old wreck. A French townhouse begins its transformation.

programme.title: Vietnam, Singapore
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Vietnam, Singapore"
programme.desc: Scotty continues his journey of Vietnam with a breath-taking cruise of Halong Bay. Carolyne is in the majestic city of London and discovers a more exotic and adventurous side of Singapore. Lynton explores the fascinating city of Jaipur, India.

programme.title: Rocky Mountains
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Rocky Mountains"
programme.desc: Scotty discovers that there’s more to Canada than the Rocky Mountains. Lynton enjoys the delights of Beijing. Scotty completes his Vietnam and Cambodia adventure with a visit to Phnom Penh. Carolyne takes in the bustling, exciting city of London.

programme.title: Bali
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Bali"
programme.desc: Lynton checks out an Aussie favourite in Bali. Scotty visits some of the smaller towns nestled amongst the magnificent Rocky Mountains. Lynton takes a look at the amazing Great Wall of China. Carolyne continues her journey around London.

programme.title: Ranch Life - Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Ranch Life - Texas"
programme.desc: Sometimes exploring the road less traveled gives you the biggest adventure. In this episode, we escape the city buzz and opt for a quieter life on a Texas ranch. Taking time to appreciate the beauty in history, animals and quality time as a family.

programme.title: Luxury With Purpose - Belize
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Luxury With Purpose - Belize"
programme.desc: Join us on an epic adventure to a remote private island in Belize. As we spend our days catching lobsters, diving the worldclass reef and enjoying coconuts straight from the tree. We also learn about how much our tourism dollars really count.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: Ultimate Luxury
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Ultimate Luxury"
programme.desc: Real Estate Agent Laura Arci Compagni helps two homeowners looking for the perfect investment. They are interested in unique investment opportunities such as units in a condo or hotel, and Laura is up to the challenge.

programme.title: Modern Resident
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Modern Resident"
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren’t busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children. They have worked hard for years, and are finally ready to buy their dream home.

programme.title: Mediterranean Scuba
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Mediterranean Scuba"
programme.desc: A British family faces local resistance while opening a business in the Spanish desert. Scuba divers search for a century-old wreck. A French townhouse begins its transformation.

programme.title: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Epic Exploring S2 - "New Orleans"
programme.desc: Cody is with Lexi Limitless in the ‘Big Easy’ to explore New Orleans, visiting an abandoned Charity Hospital before meeting Brutus, the giant alligator.

programme.title: Yerevan
programme.desc: Josh goes local exploring in Armenia and its capital Yerevan, visiting some amazing abandoned Soviet buildings, a knitting factory and a luxurious hotel.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.desc: Easy island vibes, lots of amazing local rum, brilliant natural landscapes and those amazing beaches! Of course,Luxe Travels is in Jamaica! But in this episode, host Liesel Hlista shows you a different side of the Irie nation; away from the hordes of people unleashed via cruise liners!

programme.title: Puerto Rico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Luxe Travels S1 - "Puerto Rico"
programme.desc: Liesel explores all the hands-on activities such as riding horseback on the beach, riding ATV’s through the muddy swamps, and hiking through the super lush El Yunque rainforest. Luxurious resorts are only a stones throw away - hopping islands, Liesel gets to experience the ultra modern and chic El Blok located in Vieques. Between stays at all the luxury boutique resorts, a common trend starts to appear, and that is the island’s cuisine.

programme.title: Pig
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Pig"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Thailand with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Deepaks India
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Deepaks India"
programme.desc: Deepak, Ashique, and Freddie explore South Kerala. They experience Kalaripayattu martial arts, ride Royal Enfields through scenic landscapes, enjoy a jungle cruise, taste local toddy and cuisine, and compete in a thrilling snake boat race.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Their Adventure Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Roads End S1 - "Their Adventure Begins"
programme.desc: Two adrenaline junkies that love nothing more than off road adventure motor biking. And they’re off on their most epic journey ever, to Argentina.

programme.title: Broken Bike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Roads End S1 - "Broken Bike"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are pushed to their limits. Fighting through the rough ride across the scorching sand dunes littered with shrubbery Rob is unable to continue.

programme.title: Separate Riders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Roads End S1 - "Separate Riders"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave’s patience are pushed to the limits as the whole trip hangs in the balance of Rob’s broken clutch. Will they have to buy a new bike?

programme.title: Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula"
programme.desc: Champion spear fisherman, Julian, takes Piri spear fishing and into the bush chasing pigs.

programme.title: Hawkes Bay
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Hawkes Bay"
programme.desc: Padre takes Piri to the river mouth fishing for kahawai. Plus we follow the dugs in search of wild pigs.

programme.title: Edinburgh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Access All Areas S1 - "Edinburgh"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando uncovers Edinburghs gruesome past, back when grave robbing, bodysnatching and murder were rife.

programme.title: Cornwall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Access All Areas S1 - "Cornwall"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando dives into life in Cornwall to discover the ancient practices of witchcraft and smuggling.

programme.title: Iceland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Access All Areas S1 - "Iceland"
programme.desc: Francesca is on a quest to discover why Icelandic people believe in mythical creatures. Is it folk law or are there really trolls lurking in the wilderness?

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "London"
programme.desc: In this episode Bones is back in his home city, London where he stuns locals with his mind reading, card trickery and disappearing skills.

programme.title: South Korea - Night
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "South Korea - Night"
programme.desc: Bones is in Seoul, South Korea. He explores the city by night and performs a mixture of magic tricks, including a vanishing trick, coin tricks and card tricks.

programme.title: South Korea - Traditional
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "South Korea - Traditional"
programme.desc: In this episode Bones is in South Korea, where he visits Taekwondo group, the K Tigers, a tarot card reader and reveals the secret to the perfect card shuffle.

programme.title: One More Round
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Love On The Rocks S1 - "One More Round"
programme.desc: A relaxing trip to Orcas Island takes a turn for the worst when plans begin to fall through; including the ferry ride back to the mainland. This mishap may leave them stranded for longer than expected, putting their final summit attempt at risk.

programme.title: The Honeymoon is Over
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Love On The Rocks S1 - "The Honeymoon is Over"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason take on their final peak in Washington State, Mt Baker. Tayler struggles when Jason explains all the things that could go wrong, but the reality is a lot could fail if they dont come together as a team.

programme.title: Gary, Indiana
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Epic Exploring S2 - "Gary, Indiana"
programme.desc: Josh is back in Gary, Indiana, for a local exploring adventure. With friends, he visits a former bank, the memorial auditorium and Union Train Station.

programme.title: Zagreb
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local visits Zagreb, Croatia. Cody fires a canon from the old tower, explores a never finished University Hospital and a political school.

programme.title: Barentsburg
programme.desc: Local Exploring on the edge of the world as Josh is on the artic Svalbard archipelago to explore in and around Barentsburg and the Arctic Ocean.

programme.title: Goat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Goat"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Kenya with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Alpaca
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Alpaca"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Peru with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Sheep
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Sheep"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Bulgaria with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Mahia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Mahia"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Mahia to hit the ocean in search for kingfish with his guide, Justice. Later he goes diving for sea urchins and crayfish.

programme.title: Kaikoura
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kaikoura"
programme.desc: Piri travels to Kaikoura on the east coast of the South Island. Jaye takes Piri for an easy dive, and then the pair travel up into the hills to search for wild deer.

programme.title: Auckland
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Auckland"
programme.desc: Donovan and Tipene take Piri out on the water deep sea fishing and then diving for sea urchin.

programme.title: Taharoa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Taharoa"
programme.desc: In the coastal town of Taharoa, Piri meets up with Te Marie for some rock fishing and blasts through the sand dunes on a dirt bike.

programme.title: San Juan to Laguna Brava
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Roads End S1 - "San Juan to Laguna Brava"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave put the drama of Rob’s broken clutch behind them and go full steam ahead from San Juan to Laguna Brava.

programme.title: Salt Flats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Roads End S1 - "Salt Flats"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are continuing on through the stunning scenery of Laguna Brava towards Corona del Inca. That’s not all they’ve got in store though.

programme.title: Abandoned Village
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads End S1 - "Abandoned Village"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave embrace their adventurous sides when they abandon the plan to take the safe route and instead take on what could be their most challenging riding.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: Mahia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Mahia"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Mahia to hit the ocean in search for kingfish with his guide, Justice. Later he goes diving for sea urchins and crayfish.

programme.title: Kaikoura
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kaikoura"
programme.desc: Piri travels to Kaikoura on the east coast of the South Island. Jaye takes Piri for an easy dive, and then the pair travel up into the hills to search for wild deer.

programme.title: Auckland
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Auckland"
programme.desc: Donovan and Tipene take Piri out on the water deep sea fishing and then diving for sea urchin.

programme.title: Taharoa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Taharoa"
programme.desc: In the coastal town of Taharoa, Piri meets up with Te Marie for some rock fishing and blasts through the sand dunes on a dirt bike.

programme.title: Indonesia - Balinese cuisine: what is it all about?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Indonesia - Balinese cuisine: what is it all about?"
programme.desc: Balinese cuisine is considered to be extremely complex. Different than what you find in the rest of Indonesia, Bali is further influenced by the major influx of Western tourism. Have the locals kept their traditions and cooking methods strong against the wave of tourism, or have they been catered to suit the palates of foreigners? Liesel heads to the ultimate getaway paradise island, sifts through all the yoga retreats, surfer shacks, and coffee plantations all in an effort to find iconic food - as well as track down the current foodie trend of the island.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesnt want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims hes selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
