programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Tarina keskittyy neljaan ei-niin-nuoreen orpoon: yhden heista on kasvattanut Louvren kuraattori; toinen on pakolainen meksikolaisesta vapaapainista; kolmas askettainen hanen lentokoneessaan olleiden kaarmeiden uhri; ja neljas "normaali" asukas mutantti "X" -yhteisosta. Onneton kvartetti vierailee suklaatehtaalla, jossa he tormaavat lumottuun vaatekaappiin, joka kuljettaa heidat Gnarnian maahan (hiljaisella ”G”: lla). Siella he kohtaavat prameilevan merirosvokapteenin ja vilpittomat taikuuden opiskelijat – ja yhdistavat voimansa muun muassa viisaan, mutta kiimaisen leijonan kanssa voittaakseen Gnarnian ”Pahan Valkoisen Nartun”.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Majava
programme.desc: Majavasta voi olla apua sinullekin! Walter Blackin huumori on yhta mustaa kuin hanen sukunimensa. Toissa menee huonosti, vaimo on saanut tarpeekseen ja poika vihaa isaansa. Masennuksen syovereissa - ja kesken itsetuhoisen ryyppyputken - Walter loytaa roskasailiosta nuhruisen kasinuken. Majavan. Kangasnukke kadessaan Walter voi jalleen puhua vapaasti. Ja vielapa brittiaksentilla! Mutta samalla kun Walter loytaa itsensa uudelleen, uusi majavapersoona saa hanesta yliotteen! Kaksinkertaiset Oscar-voittajat Mel Gibson ja Jodie Foster ovat tehneet palkitun kasikirjoituksen avulla yhden vuoden omaperaisimmista elokuvahelmista.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Brittany Murphy ja Dakota Fanning loistavat kirkkaammin kuin kaikki Manhattanin valot tassa ihastuttavassa New Yorkin satukertomuksessa. Molly (Murphy) on juhlivainen prinsessa, jonka rahat juuri loppuivat. Ray (Fanning) on nirso yhdeksanvuotias tytto, jonka viimeisin lastenhoitaja juuri lahti. Kun Rayn liian kiireinen aiti (Heather Locklear) palkkaa Mollyn uudeksi lastenhoitajaksi, se on taydellinen tilaisuus molemmille tytoille muuttaa tapojaan ja oppia, etta joskus paras ystavasi voi tulla odottamattomassa muodossa!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. Its all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Dave OBrien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonballs throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotels annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kates intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who is investigating a railroad holdup. Starring Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode also features James Best (1926-2015), who would go on to appear on such shows as The Andy Griffith Show, Bonanza, and The Dukes of Hazzard.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark discovers the hideout of the famous Doolin gang. Clark, along with Detective Frankie, work to infiltrate the hideout and bring the Doolin gang to justice.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Leo Gordon, Joan Shawlee, Don Kennedy, Kenneth MacDoNald, Patrick Waltz, and Ken Chryson. First aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Mr. Kenyon and his children stumble upon a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin. They take the news to Judge Bean angering Holman who plans on handing the explosives to the hostile Mescaleros. The lawmen must keep it from happening. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Doc resorts to drastic measures as he desperately seeks money to fund his free public clinic. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a girl in the woods who is running away from a man named Stark. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help an old woman find her son who has been missing for 18 years.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgans Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But its also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than hed ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers appeared in several Republic Pictures during the 1930s, and this is considered one of their best. Its about a mysterious murder at an archeological expedition, which leads the three prairie pals into some dangerous territory. Can they solve the murder without losing their own lives? The cast includes Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, and Roger Williams, all trying to survive a hail of poison arrows and hot lead!

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: When a boy is captured by a Native American tribe after his family is massacred, he finds solace in befriending a wild colt. Years later, following his escape, he is recaptured by a tribe who force him to battle their vicious devil horse. Yet, the horse looks familiar. Is this mysterious devil horse and the wild colt he knew years earlier one and the same? Produced by Hal Roach, who wrote the script with an assist from Stan Laurel, this little treasure was the fourth of 15 features to star Rex the Wonder Horse!

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRCs Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the towns growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie work to save a young man from a hangmans noose in New Mexico.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Miachael Hall, Mitchell Kowall, and Jean Inness. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode features the beloved character actor Jack Elam as Black Jack Ketchum.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie investigate a cattle dispute in Wyoming. When evidence starts to add up, it leads them to Matts old friend Tom Horn.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also sarring Louis Jean Heydt, Harry Woods, Michael Whalen, Stanley Andrews, and Walter Coy. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her fathers killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help the long-lost son of a Cree tribal chief.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go undercover as managers of a trading post. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: ITS A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin Singin Fightin Buckaroos Stop Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Mohawk
programme.desc: Kurt Neumann (The Fly, Rocketship X-M) directed this bawdy tale of a love that was louder than war drums! With a cast that includes Scott Brady, Rita Gam, and Neville Brand, the story takes place on a remote army post where an artist romances a trio of women, just as a vengeful settler turns the army and the local Iroquois tribe against each other. Film buffs might like to know that the cinematography for this feature is by four-time Oscar nominee Karl Struss, who won an Academy Award in 1929 for his work on Sunrise.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: John Wayne was 27 when he starred in this vintage western drama from Hollywoods Poverty Row. He plays Randy Bowers, a man wrongly jailed for murders. With help from a female friend, he breaks out of prison and sets out to find the real killers. Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons, Rustlers Paradise) directs a strong cast of familiar faces, including legendary sidekick George Gabby Hayes, Earl Dwyer, and one of the hardest ridin stuntmen turned actors, Yakima Canutt.

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, its up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. Theres nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and its all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Jenson Button Revisits His Biggest Racing Moments - F1, WEC, NASCAR and more
programme.desc: Jenson Button, current Hertz Team JOTA WEC driver and former F1 World Champion shares never-before-heard details on his wild 2009 title run with Brawn, his final F1 race in Monaco while subbing in for Fernando Alonso, the terrifying truth about his malfunctioning helmet in 2004, and more.

programme.title: IndyCar vs Formula 1 car: Technical Comparison
programme.desc: Which is faster: Lewis Hamiltons Formula 1 car, or Scott Dixons Indycar? Both have had major success in their respective championships, but how different are the two machines? Using our latest 3D animations, Jake Boxall-Legge breaks down everything there is to compare Indycar and Formule 1 cars, from aerodynamics, power, tyres, fuel and more.

programme.title: How Formula 1 Setups Change For Downforce Vs Power Tracks
programme.desc: What makes a Formula 1 downforce track different to a power track? Weve all heard the terms before, but different tracks require vastly different car setups to get the maximum advantage around a lap. But what are these requirements? Jake Boxall-Legge dives into why Imola, Monaco, Silverstone and Monza all require different changes to a car to succeed across the board.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasnt actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapmans complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang is one of the most successful sports cars in the world and has been an icon for over 50 years. It has amazed the world with its power, speed and amazing design.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: One of the biggest icons of the swinging sixties was the Mini. It was the perfect car of its time and often crowded streets of London.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Beetle is not just a car. For many people its THE car. Built over 22 million times, it has conquered every continent of the world. Being 60 years old, it tells us more about our century than many history books.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Ferrari - the name alone gets your heart racing. Wherever the iconic fire red legend from Maranello is, the car with the jumping horse on its emblem is always at the center of attention. Car History recounts the story of Ferrari.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew at BSG Racing is familiar with spectacular conversions. Dirk Hattenhauer and his boys have already refined a lot of cars and now they perform a special project, as they want to refurbish an old Opel Kadett C Coupe.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A lot of work, attention to detail and passion is packed into a tuned show car. But it might take some time until a car like this is ready to stand on its own four wheels.

programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing.

programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing compete at the European Tuning Showdown.

With all the best intent, June offers Becky plenty of distraction from her family life. Fueled by her anger at G*d and loss of faith, Becky starts drinking and making other self-destructive choices. Then, after Becky is arrested, Ben threatens to keep Acie until Becky is back on track. A chance encounter in a bus station with a traveler gives Becky what she needs to...

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A womans seemingly perfect life falls apart when she catches another woman in the arms of her fiance. Things get worse when she is kidnapped but all is not as it seems.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 9
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 10
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A wealthy man decides to reunite with his long-lost daughter who wants nothing to do with him. Things get even more complicated when his long-suffering wife finds out about this, as well as the fact that her husband is sleeping with her best friend.

programme.title: Unraveled
programme.desc: A family is in disarray after the head of the home dies in a car accident. His wife and daughter become cruel to those around them without any regard for the consequences.

programme.title: The Will
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Benitas world is turned upside down when she finds out that she is the daughter of a wealthy businessman who recently died. She is invited to the reading of his will but his family make things very hostile for her.

programme.title: Double Wahala
programme.desc: When her sugar daddy develops a heart attack and suddenly dies in her apartment during a romp, a young woman must find the quickest way possible to dump his body without raising suspicion. Help comes in the form of her neighbour, a yahoo-yahoo boy who masquerades as a native doctor, but when the chief’s body disappears, what was a previous case of small trouble suddenly becomes double wahala.

programme.title: Twisted Love
programme.desc: A man lives in denial of his wifes mental health but true loves comes into play and he chooses to keep his vows, no matter how much it hurts him. Will their love stand the test of time?

programme.title: One More Word
programme.desc: An aspiring actress struggles between her desire and her fears, as she has a hard time completely trusting the man she loves, not helped by the fact that he is desired by others.

programme.title: Fallen Out
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Pascal is a loving husband and father, but with his wife working in Canada, he feels like a single father to their twin teenage daughters, Rachel and Vivian. With no proper supervision the girls get up to no good behind their father’s back and when he tries to discipline them, they do the unthinkable in an effort to escape the boundaries set.

programme.title: The Wrong Date
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Amanda decides she does not want to go on a blind date with Dominic, she convinces her friend Kemi to go instead. Kemi and Dominic hit it off unexpectedly, but she becomes afraid to tell him the truth for fear of rejection. Things get more complicated when Amanda decides that Dominic is the man for her and tries to get him from Kemi.

programme.title: Just A Little Wait
programme.desc: A couple desperate to have a child begin to look for solutions to their problem outisde the home, which slowly begins the breakdown of their marriage.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: May gets a job as the house-help to a difficult man, Ramsey, and her working situation gets even worse when Ramseys girlfriend believes there is something more than a work relationship between them.

programme.title: Undoing Perfect
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Jude, Theresa and their beautiful daughter Uju seem like the perfect family, but Theresa has a dark secret which she does everything to protect. Everything changes when Uju falls ill and slums and requires immediate blood transfusion. Jude gets the shock of his life as he realizes he is not Uju’s father. "Undoing perfect" is a contemporary story of love, trust, betrayal and hurt, a sincere story of love and marriage.

programme.title: For Richer
programme.desc: Leye and Hadiza Adeyemi have fallen out of love with each other and find themselves heading for a divorce. They are both very happy with this decision until Leye’s parents come to stay for the weekend and things gets very awkward.

programme.title: Hooked
programme.desc: Femi is a good man who tries to always do right by his family. When he finds himself fired from work and unable to provide for his pregnant wife, he turns to his friend, Jaiye, for help and advice. Jaiye presents a business proposal which Femi reluctantly agrees to, not knowing exactly what he is walking into.

programme.title: Stitched Love
programme.desc: Isabel has it all going well for her as a student, sister, and daughter until finding out the man she loves leaves her in a traumatic state.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. After a wild night, Nonso wakes up to find his girlfriend Ronke, dead in the bathroom. He raises the alarm with his friends, John and Wole, along with their girlfirends, but everyone denies knowing what happened and all have alibis for when Ronke died. The only person without an alibi is Nonso who denies killing Ronke.

programme.title: A Second Chance at Love
programme.desc: 11 years after his heart is broken by Mercy, Bryan runs into her when he comes back to Lagos after being abroad for his studies. They begin to rekindle their relationship until a huge secret kept by mercy threatened to tear apart the very fabric of their love, but can love conquer all?

programme.title: Lurikos
programme.desc: Terminally-ill Michael believes he has found new love with Serena (Tamara Jones) after his wife is killed in a car accident. However, things are complicated when he finds out Serena is promised to another, but will true love find a way through all these challenges?

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A womans seemingly perfect life falls apart when she catches another woman in the arms of her fiance. Things get worse when she is kidnapped but all is not as it seems.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 2
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: Stood Up
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. On the day of her wedding to Patrick, Roselyn receives a message from him telling her that he would not be showing up as he can no longer marry her. Heartbroken, she reluctantly rekindles her relationship with Walter, her ex boyfriend, who she broke up with because of his cult ties. Walter convinces Roselyn he is no longer in a cult, and they soon make plans to marry, however the unexpected happens a night to their wedding.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?

programme.title: Femi
programme.desc: Geneticist Femi Fernandez seeks the perfect male gene, inspired by the works of an enchanting painting, that makes her unexpectedly drawn to the artist to devastating consequences.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Jennifer Mairo
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Natse Jemide
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Dionee
programme.desc: Paul, a young mechanic, falls in love with an orange-seller, Dionee, and decides to send her to the city and pay for her education. After some time Paul proposes to her but Dionee rejects him, deciding she can do better than an illiterate man.

programme.title: Coincidental Love
programme.desc: In the quest of getting a man to impress her nosy sister and brother in-law, Pearl gets entangled with Kennedy, who pretends to be Pearls blind date, Jerry, someone she has hired to help her out. When Pearl finds out this lie, she kicks Kennedy out of her house but they keep crossing paths.

programme.title: Fallen Out
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Pascal is a loving husband and father, but with his wife working in Canada, he feels like a single father to their twin teenage daughters, Rachel and Vivian. With no proper supervision the girls get up to no good behind their father’s back and when he tries to discipline them, they do the unthinkable in an effort to escape the boundaries set.

programme.title: The Best 1969 Party - Ever!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Best 1969 Party - Ever!
programme.desc: The year that set the musical agenda for the whole of the next decade. 20 scene setters with songs for every taste, whether you like The Beatles, The Stones or the Archies!

programme.title: Who Won Wot? 1970-1979
programme.desc: From The NME to The Grammys to the coveted Rear of the Year - Mark Goodiers 10 hour marathon of 70s award winners lasts nearly as long as the Oscars!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men and leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground and the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: The Best 1973 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from 73 including Mud, The Sweet, Suzi Quatro, Elton John and some early Abba!

programme.title: All Day - Its 1973!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1973 and relive a year ablaze with excitement including groudbreaking music from Slade, Sweet, T.Rex and Elton John.

programme.title: The 1973 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1973 POWER Hour with Bam!

programme.title: 50 Rockstars Of The 00s
programme.desc: The legends and bands that made the 00s rock! Expect anthems from Nickleback, Green Day, Linkin Park, The Arctic Monkeys, Evanescence and many more.

programme.title: The Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro and The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Alex Bakers 30 Emo Anthems
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alex Bakers 30 Emo Anthems
programme.desc: Alex serves up 30 of the greatest, darkest, skinny jeans-iest, heavy eye makeup-iest and back-combed hair-iest anthems from the worlds most glorious miserable genre!

programme.title: Killer Cuts Of The 00s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Killer Cuts Of The 00s!
programme.desc: A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy and loads more!

programme.title: Green Day: Fan Favourites
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Green Day: Fan Favourites
programme.desc: From 1995 to 2009 - 30 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Green Day!

programme.title: The Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro and The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: 90s v 00s Rock Anthems!
programme.desc: 40 classic rock anthems back to back - one from the 90s followed by another from the 00s. Simple!

programme.title: Maxed Out On Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maxed Out On Anthems!
programme.desc: Live it loud and Max out on the finest rock anthems! Featuring Paramore, Imagine Dragons, Linkin Park, Evanescense and The Arctic Monkeys. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Turn Up The Pop Punk Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Turn Up The Pop Punk Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn up your spreakers to 11 and live life even louder! 1 hour of 00s Pop Punk Anthems in order, featurng Green Day, Blink-182, Sum 41, Bowling For Soup and The All-American Rejects

programme.title: Jenny Powells Air Guitar Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jenny Powells Air Guitar Anthems!
programme.desc: Jenny is back in the 90s with killer cuts and some proper full-on guitar action! Including Guns n Roses, Nirvana, Bon Jovi, Oasis, The Offspring and Lenny Kravitz.

programme.title: 50 Rockstars Of The 00s
programme.desc: The legends and bands that made the 00s rock! Expect anthems from Nickleback, Green Day, Linkin Park, The Arctic Monkeys, Evanescence and many more.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Joulukoristeita ja kulkusten kilinaa, musikaalilauluja ja zombimaailmanloppu. Kesken joulukiireiden pikkukaupunki Little Havenia uhkaa yllattaen lahestyva tuho. Anna ja hanen ystavansa paattavat taistella zombilaumoja vastaan – mutta kehen voi luottaa maailmassa, joka on romahtamaisillaan? Kauhukomedia jouluisessa musikaaliasussa.

programme.title: Joulu tilauksesta
programme.desc: Gretchen saa joulun tapahtua missa ja milloin tahansa.

programme.title: A Taste Of Christmas
programme.desc: Kun pikkukaupungin yrittelias leipuri Emily saa omatekoisen joulukalenterin salaiselta ihailijalta, paikalliset haluavat kiihkeasti selvittaa lahettajan henkilollisyyden. Kaupungissa juoruillaan seka joulukalenterista etta Emilyn rakkausseikkailuista, koska kaikki poikamiehet ovat kiinnostuneita hanesta. Mutta Emilya kiinnostaa hanen pahin kilpailijansa, ranskalaisleipuri Gerard.

programme.title: Puppy Star Christmas
programme.desc: Pup Star -perhe on kasvanut! Uusien pentujen, Cindyn, Rosien, Charlien ja Brodyn tulee oppia, mita joulu oikeasti tarkoittaa. Kun Pup Starin pahikset juonivat pilaavansa joulun, pennut paatyvat pohjoisnavalle pelastamaan joulupukin ja jouluhengen. Heidan seikkailunsa on taynna uusia pentumaisia lauluja, jotka levittavat joulun riemua vuoden ympari.

programme.title: A Christmas Movie Christmas
programme.desc: Sisarukset Eve ja Lacey toivovat joulua, joka olisi kuin suoraan elokuvamaailmasta. Aivan yllattaen he huomaavatkin olevansa keskella jouluelokuvaa. He heraavat satumaisessa ja taydellisessa ”Joulukaupungissa”, jossa on taydellinen joulu ja jossa kaikki on vain aivan taydellista. Mita enemman sisarukset tutkivat kaikkea jouluun liittyvaa, sita enemman he tajuavat, etta taydellisyys ei ehka olekaan perinteisen joulun oikea tarkoitus. Ehka onkin olemassa toisenlainen taika, johon kuuluvat palaneet piparkakut ja kuivunut joulukinkku…?

programme.title: Jouluhaat
programme.desc: Haley Foster pakeni lapsuutensa pikkukaupungista Pineridgesta ja siirtyi suurkaupunkilaiselamaan losangelesilaisena haajarjestelijana rva Reynoldsin omistamassa eliittiluokan yrityksessa.

programme.title: Mina armahdan Mooses ei (The Troublemakers)
programme.desc: Travis (Terence Hill) on lannen nopein vetaja. Hanen veljensa Moses (Bud Spencer) on vakeva kuin karhu, mutta monin verroin pahansisuisempi ja seudun kovin palkkionmetsastaja. Kun heidan vanha aitimuorinsa paattaa saattaa veljekset yhteen jouluna, saa Travis tehtavakseen houkutella Moseksen kotiin.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys a Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea juhlistaa joulua yhdessa ystavansa ja taman maalla asuvan perheen kanssa. Nyt on parasta olla kilttina!

programme.title: A Winter Princess
programme.desc: Hienon gaalan jalkeen prinsessa Carly paattaa pitaa sapattivuoden ja aloittaa unelmatyon hiihtokeskuksessa. Yksikaan uusista tyotovereista ei tieda, kuka han oikeasti on. Mutta kun kuninkaallisen suvun jasenia ilmestyy hiihtokeskukseen, salaisuutta on pian hyvin vaikea sailyttaa paljastumatta. Samalla valmistellaan keskuksen 50-vuotisjuhlia ja Carly huomaa ihastuneensa omistajan veljeen Jesseen. Carlyn taytyy tehda suuria paatoksia elamassaan ja han tuntee olevansa yha enemman ymmallaan.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Tassa lamminhenkisessa joulukomediassa Rodriguezin perheen kauempana asuvat jasenet kokoontuvat vanhempiensa kotiin kenties viimeista kertaa viettamaan joulua yhdessa.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: The Christmas Setup
programme.desc: Asianajaja Hugo matkustaa New Yorkista kotikaupunkiinsa Milwaukieen tapaamaan aitiaan. Äiti esittelee hanelle vanhan lukioaikaisen ihastuksensa Patrickin, ja parin valilla alkaa kipinoida. Mutta Hugolle tarjotaan unelmatyota Lontoossa ja hanen on valittava: ura vai juuri loytynyt rakkaus.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Joulukoristeita ja kulkusten kilinaa, musikaalilauluja ja zombimaailmanloppu. Kesken joulukiireiden pikkukaupunki Little Havenia uhkaa yllattaen lahestyva tuho. Anna ja hanen ystavansa paattavat taistella zombilaumoja vastaan – mutta kehen voi luottaa maailmassa, joka on romahtamaisillaan? Kauhukomedia jouluisessa musikaaliasussa.

programme.title: This is England 88 (Part 2)
programme.desc: Tuhoisat tapahtumat, jotka tapahtuivat 18 kuukautta sitten, vainoavat Lolia (Vicky McClure) ja Woodya (Joe Gilgun), jotka molemmat kamppailevat selvitakseen tunteellisesta tappiosta. Lol huomaa nopeasti, etta hanen voimavaransa ovat ehtymassa, kun han yrittaa hoitaa uusia vastuita ja vanhoja velvoitteita. Yhdessa sielunkumppaninsa Woodyn kanssa, joka on epatoivoinen petoksestaan ja itse valitsemastaan maanpaosta jengin ulkopuolella, Lol eristaytyy ja tuntee itsensa yha yksinaisemmaksi.

programme.title: Lahetys joulua
programme.desc: Kun hanen lahetyskumppaninsa paattaa lahtea Amerikan suosikkiaamuohjelmasta, Veronika Daniels ilmoittaa valitsevansa uuden juontajakansa kourallisen ehdokkaiden joukosta, joihin kuuluu paikallinen New Yorkin uutislahettaja Charlie Fisher.

programme.title: High Holiday
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Liz ei ole kovin innokas viemaan poikaystavaansa vanhoillisen perheensa joulupaivalliselle. Mutta poikaystava ehdottaa, etta Liz maustaisi salaattikastikkeen marijuanalla, jotta tunnelma vapautuisi. Alkaa kaaos, kun kaikki ovat tietamattaan pilvessa ja perheensisaiset salaisuudet paljastuvat.

programme.title: Joulumaa
programme.desc: Joulumaa on nahnyt parempiakin paivia Glindan menehdyttya, ja Julesin taytyy tehda valtavia paatoksia.

programme.title: Mina armahdan Mooses ei (The Troublemakers)
programme.desc: Travis (Terence Hill) on lannen nopein vetaja. Hanen veljensa Moses (Bud Spencer) on vakeva kuin karhu, mutta monin verroin pahansisuisempi ja seudun kovin palkkionmetsastaja. Kun heidan vanha aitimuorinsa paattaa saattaa veljekset yhteen jouluna, saa Travis tehtavakseen houkutella Moseksen kotiin.

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: Cooperien iso perhe kokoontuu viettamaan joulua yhdessa, mutta perinteisia kuvioita sotkevat yllatysvieraat.

programme.title: Joulukievari
programme.desc: Kun liikenainen Jennifer kuulee vanhempiensa lahtevan matkoille jouluksi ilman hanta, han paattaa jattaa San Franciscon humun taakseen ja lahtea Alaskaan tutustumaan isoaidiltaan perinnoksi saamaansa kievarrin, joka on tarkoitus kunnostaa ja myyda.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: 12 Pups of Christmas
programme.desc: Erinin miessuhteen paatyttya han aloittelee elamaansa uudessa tyossa ja uudessa kaupungissa. Mutta juuri kun han luulee paasseensa tasapainoon, han tormaa itsekeskeiseen pomoonsa Martiniin. Mies yrittaa pitaa firmaansa pystyssa ja pyytaa Erinilta apua. Hanen pitaisi juuri ennen joulua huolehtia 12 koiranpennusta, jotka ovat jaaneet toimistolle kuvaustoiden loputtua. Kun Erin ja Martin tekevat tyota yhdessa, tunteet lampenevat, ja rakkaus tulee mukaan sopivasti juuri jouluksi.

programme.title: Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Tom on luonut uran auttamalla asiakkaita, jotta nama loytaisivat rakastetulleen taydellisen lahjan. Joulun lahestyessa Tomin paras ystava Paul pyytaa Tomia keksimaan lahjan tyttoystavalleen Jennylle. Kun Tom tutustuu Jennyyn paremmin, asia mutkistuu, koska han huomaa rakastuneensa kaverinsa tyttoystavaan. Tyotehtava on melkein hoidettu, mutta Tom on pahoillaan, koska hanen ainoa mahdollisuutensa loytaa sielunkumppani on kariutumassa.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Menestysmysteerikirjailija Mary Higgins Clarkin romaaniin perustuva elokuva nahdaan jouluna salapoliisitarinana. Naisetsiva lyottaytyy yksiin amatoorietsivan kanssa loytaakseen kadonneen isansa.

programme.title: Joulu tilauksesta
programme.desc: Gretchen saa joulun tapahtua missa ja milloin tahansa.

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming To Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Aktiivinen, liberaali ja edistyksellinen oikeustieteen opiskelija Maya tuo uuden poikaystavansa kotiin jouluksi - kertomatta perheelleen, etta han on valkoinen. Arvaa, kuka tulee joulupaivalliselle?

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Happy New Year, Colin Burstead
programme.desc: Colin Burstead paattaa vuokrata ylellisen kartanon ja ottaa uuden vuoden vastaan perheen ja suvun kanssa. Kun David-veli ilmestyy kutsumatta paikalle, veljesten keskinainen kilpailu karjistyy huippuunsa. Uudenvuodenjuhlat, joista Colin oli toivonut suvun leppoisaa jalleennakemista, muuttuvat viheliaiseksi juonitteluksi. Happy New Year, Colin Burstead on kriitikoiden kehuman Ben Wheatleyn uusin elokuva, joka huokuu hanelle ominaista mustaa huumoria ja epasovinnaista kerrontaa.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Joulukoristeita ja kulkusten kilinaa, musikaalilauluja ja zombimaailmanloppu. Kesken joulukiireiden pikkukaupunki Little Havenia uhkaa yllattaen lahestyva tuho. Anna ja hanen ystavansa paattavat taistella zombilaumoja vastaan – mutta kehen voi luottaa maailmassa, joka on romahtamaisillaan? Kauhukomedia jouluisessa musikaaliasussa.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: En forsikringsmann som kjemper med tap og kjærlighet, oppdager nye muligheter i en uke full av uventede hendelser og komiske vendepunkter.

programme.title: Joulun ihmemaa
programme.desc: Joulun aika NYC:ssa on kaikkea muuta kuin ihanaa kamppailevalle taiteilija Heidi Neillille.

programme.desc: Hailing from London, England... "Smooth" Simeon Powell is the truth. Simeon makes his debut in the 2022 PFL Challenger Series and continues his winning ways.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: For the first-time ever, someone not named Lance Palmer will be named the Featherweight Champion as two great wrestlers meet in the 2021 Champoionship

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: Grapplers have an advantage when the fight hits the canvas, so Protect Ya Neck or you might find yourself looking up at the lights.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.sub-title: S01 : E95 Quitting on the Stool
programme.desc: Its always a tough night in the office when you get paid to get punched in the face. In this WSOF throwback episode, we see a fighter pull off a 3rd round comeback and two fighters throw in the towel.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: Two Featherweight showcase matches go down in the 2021 PFL Playoffs. Plus, Antonio Carlos Jr. takes on Marthin Hamlet for the 2021 PFL Light Heavyweight World Championship

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: Former and future champions and contenders take over Arlington! Ante Delija and Brendan Loughnane begin their 2022 World Championshp campaigns.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: Sometimes, it just isnt your night inside the SmartCage. Check out these spectacular performances featuring perenial contenders; Denis Goltsov, Bubba Jenkins, and Bruno Cappelozza

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.sub-title: S01 : E90 Gold Medals in the Cage
programme.desc: Two Double Olympic gold medalists enter the PFL SmartCage as Kayla Harrison looks to add a second PFL Championship to her mantle while Claressa Shields has her second pro MMA fight

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: A monster-sized contender emerges in the heavyweight division when Renan Ferreira delivers one of the fastest KOs in PFL History

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: The PFL Playoff events always bring the drama! With so many eyes wathching to see who will fight in the PFL Championship, Amanda Leve, Brandon Jenkins, and Antonio Carlos Jr. deliver spectacular performances

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.sub-title: S01 : E79 No Place to Hide
programme.desc: Heavy Hitters and World Champions in the SmartCage as Kayla Harrison and Movlid Khaybulaev look to lock up the Number 1 Seed.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: 2018 Welterweight Champion Magomedkerimov and Cory Hendricks have just one fight to earn enough points to qualify for the playoffs, while Joao Zeferino looks to secure the top seed.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: With one last chance to earn points and a spot in the 2021 PFL Playoffs, every second matters for the lightweights.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.sub-title: S01 : E85 Quick Fights and Huge Upset
programme.desc: Bruno Cappelozza and Kayla Harrison deliver quick finishes. Ante Delija looks to turn the heavyweight division into a frenzy when he challenges the Season favorite

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: Four fighters compete in the PFL for the very first time, hoping to stamp their ticket into the 2022 Regular Season and a shot at One-Million Dollars.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.sub-title: S01 : E80 Showtime vs War Horse
programme.desc: Coming off of a stunning defeat at PFL 1, Anthony Showtime Pettis looks to rebound, but he faces stiff competition in Raush War Horse Manfio, in a match with serious playoff implications.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: Brazils Larissa Pacheco delivers a highlight reel KO that puts her on the top 10 SportsCenter plays of the day.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.desc: The Biggest names in the PFL Welterweight Division compete. In a long-awaited matchup, 2019 Champion Ray Cooper III faces MMA legend Rory MacDonald. Not to be outdone, 2018 Champion Magomed Magomedkerimov has his eyes set on another Finals Appearance as he faces Sadibou Sy.

programme.title: PFL Vault
programme.sub-title: S01 : E76 You Be The Judge
programme.desc: Rory MacDonald vs Gleison Tibau delivers the most controversial decision in MMA History. How did you score this one at home?

programme.desc: Branch vs. McElligott

programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 WSOF30: Branch vs. Starks

programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 WSOF26: Palmer vs. Almeida
