programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Food Fact Fun Yilan, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex explores Yilan starting from Xing-Yuan tea farm, then visits Farmers’ Market, tries a duck delicacy. Further he visits a Museum, a Whiskey Distillery, National Centre for Traditional Arts, enjoys a high speed train ride and treks up to experience the beauty of a waterfall.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Off The Grid Srinagar, India
programme.desc: Alex is in Srinagar putting up on a houseboat. She explores the Dal lake, tries Kashmiri Tea, and ends her day with a traditional Kashmiri platter – Wazwan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 World Heritage Pattadakal, India
programme.desc: Listen to the tales of Pattadakal temples, built by Kings, claiming their legitimacy from Gods and hear the echoes of the legacy of sun-worshippers.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer and Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer and Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Daniel Hautot
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Daniel Hautot
programme.desc: He had a real professional rise, quickly moving from commercial to sales manager. But the awareness quickly catches up with him too: what is the purpose of all this? Is it a real pursuit of happiness? Daniel keeps his acquired skills and puts them to the benefit of his passion for yoga. Follow Daniel until the opening of his yoga and community space.

programme.title: Guillaume Nivelle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Guillaume Nivelle
programme.desc: To make a profession representative of his personality is the discovery made by Guillaume at twenty-six. After several years as a bartender and crossing a dark period, Guillaume discovers nature and falls in love with it. Accompany Guillaume in his passion, in the middle of a refitted nature.

programme.title: Laura Belfadla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Laura Belfadla
programme.desc: Laura will not tell you the whole truth because she does not want a system where you are told what to do. After several years as head of business development in law firm, Laura changes her life and creates the plant academy. Let yourself go for a healthier life.

programme.title: Laurence Sala
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Laurence Sala
programme.desc: It took a burnout and several miscarriages to Laurence to take a new path. Its finally a bad thing for a good. Throughout her ordeals, Laurence will know how to listen to her needs, her desires and her passions. With a surprise, follow Laurence in her life as a mother and naturopath.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 2
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York, has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and amazing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We go to China in the province of Yunan, where a plant with exceptional virtues against malaria has been discovered. Then we travel to Africa, where mans intervention in the ecosystem of Lake Victoria has triggered a considerable imbalance. We will also explore to Greenland to meet the polar bears, the first victims of the melting ice.

programme.title: Sweets on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Sweets on the menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us down a different kind of yellow-brick road, one that tastes of childhood and gourmet delights: the road of sweets. France may be famous for its gastronomy, but its not to be outdone when it comes to pastries and confectionery - quite the opposite. “Betises” from Cambrai, "Berlingots” from Carpentras, "Calissons” from Aix-en-provence, every region in France has its own sweet or confectionery.

programme.title: Acrobatic Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Acrobatic Yoga
programme.desc: In this episode, Val gets to know Jamie and her thirty gons whom mystical sounds invite to introspection and relaxation in a relaxing setting. She then attends a perilous acrobatic yoga class with Vibe Yoga where her sense of balance has been challenged a few times. Believe or leave! This is Bol Meditation’s motto where Val discovers the benefits of Intense meditation on our body and mind. All together, this place is a piece of heaven in the middle of ettic L.A.

programme.title: Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.desc: Val will make us discover Chromo Yoga, which combines light and color therapy with yoga. Then well meet Mia Frye who will present us all the detox cures of the moment at Atelier Nubio. Finally, Val will test gluten-free gourmet waffles, both sweet and savory, the new trendy dessert for Parisian women.

programme.title: Melliferous plants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Melliferous plants
programme.desc: Lets get together to continue discovering new plants together. Look at all these flowers, they are honey plants. But what are honey plants? Doesnt that make you think of another word? The word honey? Yes, because honey plants are plants that attract insects, and in particular bees, which feed on these flowers to make honey.

programme.title: Destination Sardinia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Sardinia
programme.desc: The first stop on this journey to the land of happy, long life is the Ogliastra region of Sardinia. Here, almost one in five inhabitants is over 90 - 20 times more than in France! Yet this is a far cry from the Mediterranean diet recommended by nutritionists: meat and cholesterol galore. Even more astonishing, consanguinity is paradoxically conducive to the extreme longevity of the inhabitants... our wellness food specialist and a general practitioner will investigate these phenomena and meet nonagenarians and centenarians with exceptional stories.

programme.title: Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.desc: To better understand the role of these explosive mountains located all over the world, on land or under the sea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes to Italy, the country with the most active volcanoes in Europe. Accompanied by volcano expert Jacques-Marie Bardintzeff, the photographer meets those people who have chosen to live with « their » volcano, in spite of the dangers involved in this kind of proximity.

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 1
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and astonishing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We find ourselves in Kenya, where the biodiversity is particularly rich, in the Massaï Mara reserve. Then, in the Democratic Republic of Congo, where the worrying disappearance of hippos from Lake Edward has unexpected consequences for the survival of fishermen. Then, in the sanctuary of life, the Pantanal region in Brazil, where millions of animal and plant species are teeming, some of the worlds great wetlands also in danger. In Tasmania, Yann Arthus-Bertrand fights against the napalm deforestation of one of the oldest and most beautiful forests...

programme.title: The flavors of flowers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of flowers
programme.desc: Eating flowers might appear unconventional, but we often consume them without even realizing it. Consider artichokes, for instance : they are essentially large, unopened flowers. Capers are the preserved buds of flowers soaked in vinegar, and cloves are dried flower buds. We also find courgette flowers, saffron pistils, orange blossom water used to flavor pastries, and the violet sweets that evoke memories of our childhood. In addition to adding aesthetic appeal and providing a dose of vitamins to our plates, flowers elevate the flavors of a dish and can even serve as a vegetable substitute.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Hot Yoga Session
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hot Yoga Session
programme.desc: Always on the look for looking for new detox discoveries, Val leads us to Lifehouse’s tonic and elixirs. Here, she discovers the range of elixir with therapeutic virtues exhilarating and relaxing. Before leaving, we made a hook by Jacks lab to prepare our own elixir. A private hot Yoga session then awaited Val at the popular Urban Exhale Hot Yoga where wearing a swimsuit could be welcomed. This episode ends on a fruity note as we tasted smoothies with unusual names that seduced Val, especially the 72 and Sun.

programme.title: Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.desc: Val gives an appointment to the singer Sinclair, for a floating session: a sensory deprivation technique in a bath. Then, we will discover an experience that is all the rage across the Atlantic, the Barre Shape! Its a class that mixes classical dance, yoga and cardio training. All this in a girly and boudoir atmosphere. After the effort comes comfort! We will meet a Superfood expert who will make us test and discover all the "Superfoods" that are very popular in California and that the whole healthy world is talking about.

programme.title: Collecting seeds
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Collecting seeds
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to save seeds. As you may have noticed, fruits, such as apples and lemons, contain seeds, but so do some of the vegetables you eat, such as peppers and tomatoes. This is because they are, in fact, fruits just like the apple and the lemon. They come from a flower and therefore contain seeds.

programme.title: Destination Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Okinawa
programme.desc: Genetic, biological, cultural and dietary factors combine to make the Japanese island of Okinawa a zone of extreme longevity. Why is it that cancer is virtually non-existent here? Well see that the famous Japanese trio of "rice, fish and soy" is not the key to longevity, but a diet based on plants, lots of green leafy vegetables and endemic sweet potatoes. Self-restriction and strong social ties are other elements that our naturopathic chef and attending physician will discover on site, together with local inhabitants and scientists.

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 2
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

You will focus on your past and think only about the good, positive moments. Youll be guided throughout the entire exercise so that in the end, youll be able to learn from your past experience and open up to others in a similar way.

programme.title: Greece, Euphoria Retreat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Greece, Euphoria Retreat
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, embark on a transformative journey to Euphoria Retreat.A mystical place offering a holistic approach to well-being aimed at restoring balance between body, mind and soul.After a long struggle with illness, its founder embarked on a personal quest to find balance. An in-depth reflection which resulted in the creation of a place where one could share and transmit this method of well-being. Euphoria Retreat is a clever blend of Taoist and Hellenic philosophy based on the symbolism of the five elements: water, wood, fire, earth and metal. Ancestral wisdom and scientific advances offer a transformative immersion in self-discovery. The tools developed by Euphoria...

programme.title: Italy, Palazzo Fiuggi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Italy, Palazzo Fiuggi
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset we discover Palazzo Fiuggi, a haven of well-being located in the heart of the natural springs of Fiuggi, famous for their purifying and healing powers.The Palazzo was born from the vision of a science and health enthusiast. This historic place of well-being offers exclusive medical-scientific therapies combining the healing properties of water with advances in Western medicine and alternative medicines. Upon arrival, a team of specialists carries out a targeted diagnosis to create a personalized protocol, rebalancing the mind, body and soul, with a simple promise: offering a longer and better-lived life.A constantly evolving method, between ancestral wisdom and...

programme.title: Poultry on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Poultry on the menu
programme.desc: Julie heads for Burgundy to discover ancient breeds of poultry reintroduced to France thanks to the work of breeder Fred Menager. Well then move on to Auvergne to discover how the famous Label Rouge is awarded and the role of certifying bodies ... because its important to know what ends up on our plates. Julie also travels to the Drôme to cook guinea fowl, before heading to the Perigord to prepare a turkey stew. Julie will then head back up towards the center to discover an amazing fly maker who uses rooster feathers!

programme.title: Floating Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Floating Yoga
programme.desc: Just Float, this is the latest yoga trend and mantra for an relaxed mind. As you enter a fully soundproof studio and float in vats filled with epson salts, you will disconnect from the urban buzz. That is Val’s promise as she takes us to experience this funny trend. With a sain mind comes a sain body: it’s time to head to Clover Juice, the most famous juice address in Los Angeles. As we make our way through Clover’s kitchen, we discover this way of life, mix and learn more on these beverage’s benefits.

programme.title: Animal Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Animal Farm
programme.desc: In this episode, we will go to a ranch, which is a real sanctuary for animals. The animals are king and the llama is the star. This center takes in animals to give them a safer and happier life in a beautiful setting. Then Val will participate in a Namastday Yoga session, another trend in yoga involving ropes hanging from the ceiling, acrobatic poses and great flexibility.

programme.title: Planting vegetables in the fall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Planting vegetables in the fall
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville, to continue installing vegetables in the vegetable garden. Yes, it is possible, even in autumn. Because if its true that most vegetables are planted in spring or summer, some varieties can be planted in early autumn and are fast-growing, which will allow you to harvest them in late autumn or early winter. Lets get started! Were going to plant winter spinach together and well show you a little trick you need to know to harvest it properly.

This bowl is composed by different colored vegetables which allows us to fill up with nutrients, minerals and vitamins. The look of a nice dish makes us secrete more digestive enzymes.

programme.title: Claire
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Claire
programme.desc: One woman’s personal mission to reduce her household rubbish turned into a passion that gave birth to Southeast Asia’s first Zero-Waste Bulk Food shop. Claire is a driven and successful mother of three who turned away from her corporate job to channel her business-savvy into reducing our impact on the environment and contributing to the improvement of her local community.

programme.title: Zaira (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Zaira (Argentina)
programme.desc: For a long time Zaira let herself be defined solely as a survivor of the traumatic sexual assault that marked her life. In her healing search, she left behind the busy city life and moved to seek solace in the mountains of Mendoza. It is among these magnificent peaks that Zaira found peace within herself and harmony with her surroundings. Now, eager to help others heal, she is the leader of a trekking initiative that doubles as a support group for other women who are victims of sexual aggression.

programme.title: Ile (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Ile (Argentina)
programme.desc: Ileana studied business and worked long hours indoors for a multinational logistics company. Her love for dance and desire for movement drove her to quit her corporate life and begin a new chapter as a fitness trainer. Quickly exhausting the traditional methods available at her local gyms, she began to create innovative and groundbreaking exercise methods of her own. Her goal: to empower women by making them feel strong and feminine at the same time.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.desc: Water and its beauty, water and its power, water and its fragility... the water we all need is becoming scarce, through our own fault. Some rivers are dry, others are diverted, cut off by dams, others are simply polluted, and this for decades. We will discover how humans transformed the nature in Argentina, then in China and its disproportionate Three Gorges Dam. We will also go in Botswana with the Okavango, this unique river which flows into a desert forming the famous Okavango Delta. Vu du Ciel makes you discover once again another world, magnificent but threatened.

programme.title: Differential relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Differential relaxation
programme.desc: This exercise helps you develop what we call differential relaxation. The aim is to learn to relax the entire body except the parts necessary to the proper development of an action. For example, when youre working in the office, your back and your arms are often extremely contracted when really only your eyes and hands are involved in the task.

programme.title: France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we take you to “Le Bruit de leau”, an ecolodge nestled in the heart of the Baie de Somme nature reserve, in France. In the middle of nature, discover a place of absolute serenity inspired by the Japanese lifestyle and the travels of a great reporter, its founder.The intimate atmosphere that reigns at Le Bruit de leau (The Sound of Water) envelops you in a soothing calm, creating a cocoon made for relaxation and personal rejuvenation.This ecolodge allows us to cultivate awareness of the present moment and to open up to a fulfilling perception of our environment. Le Bruit de leau opens the doors to a transformative experience, where beauty of the natural...

programme.title: Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we fly to Sri Lanka to discover an old tea plantation transformed into a sumptuous refuge: Santani.In order to find an alternative to the stress of urban life, the hotel offers a modern approach to Ayurveda. This traditional Indian medicine aims to establish a balance between the individual and the world around them. Thanks to the development of a personalized program, each visitor is invited to find harmony within this restorative sanctuary.Santani was created by a Sri Lankan eager to preserve our physical and spiritual well-being in a peaceful and healthy place to reconnect with the world differently. Lets discover a holistic approach to health, including...

programme.title: The flavors of chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of chocolate
programme.desc: Today, the gluttons should not be disappointed since chocolate is in the spotlight. Discovered by the Mayans 2500 years ago and then more widely by the Aztecs, chocolate is today one of the favorite products in the world. And make no mistake about it: just as the kitchen has its great chefs, chocolate also has its great chocolatiers.As for recipes, Julie will introduce you to a cake that is only made in Saint Émilien and which combines chocolate with macarons, before heading to the Basque Country for a dessert to spice you up. We will then climb up the mountain to meet a Swiss cook. Finally, you will see that chocolate has several surprises in store for us: it has many virtues and is...

programme.title: Hotel on Pacific
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hotel on Pacific
programme.desc: Val takes us to one of the most beautiful hotels in California: The Belmont Hotel! Much more than a hotel, this place is a natural haven where everything is made to relax while overlooking the Pacific. While relaxation is key, we also seek adventures, don’t we? While in this dream setting, we will practice yoga among the turtles, walk around the vertical and organic garden with the Chef and treat ourselves with a massage with essential oils coming directly from the garden.

programme.title: Surfing and Vineyards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Surfing and Vineyards
programme.desc: Yoga and Surf are two corner stones of the Californian spirit. In this episode, the best of both worlds meets as Val shares a surf session with a local champion from Malibu! What about the surfing outfit ? No need for it, there is a yoga mat. Let’s head to Ojai, in the middle of a vineyards, and joint the "Topa Wines" group for a yoga session at the sunset. Together, we will enjoy the "Pink moment": the time when Ojai’s mountains turn pink and your mind is blown away.

programme.title: Repotting an indoor plant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Repotting an indoor plant
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to take good care of our indoor plants. The plants that grow in our houses and flats are grown in pots. And when we buy a new plant, it is very important to repot it. The plants we buy come in pots that are often too small for them to grow well. Thats why you put it in a bigger pot.

programme.title: Agostina (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Agostina (Argentina)
programme.desc: When Agostina’s mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, she began seeking out soft natural fabrics that would not irritate her mother’s sensitive skin. She found it almost impossible to find the right materials, so she decided to make her own. Research led her to bamboo fibers and she realised she could make a positive impact on the environment, while developing sustainable and ethical fashion.

programme.title: Solenn (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Solenn (Nantes)
programme.desc: A former school teacher reinvents herself when she discovers a passion for sharing other women’s stories. Always inspired by the journeys of strong women, Solenn began a blog to celebrate the women in her community. Solenn’s energy and passion fueled a dream of starting her own magazine. Thanks to a successful crowdfunding campaign, this dream blossomed into a professional career in journalism and she launched a print mook (magazine and book) called Etonnantes. Etonnantes features interviews of women of all backgrounds, celebrating their diversity and success in each field.

programme.title: Sophie (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Sophie (Nantes)
programme.desc: Always an artist at heart, Sophie grew up in the countryside amongst nature and farm animals. Her love for creating art while respecting nature turned into a drive to seek out sustainable vegetable dyes.Today, her artwork and craft are intertwined as she makes beautiful prints and motifs that she colours with natural dyes, prepared from handpicked variety of flowers and plants that turn into stunning creations.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand thus continues his world tour and his inventory of the planet with the great rivers that suffer from mans excesses as a common thread. " So the great rivers may live" is the discovery of places, men and women who are fighting so that our waterways simply have their place on Earth. Thanks to his genius, man is correcting his mistakes: the Aral Sea, which once disappeared, is coming back. In New York, millions of people have drinking water thanks to the natural virtues of the forest.

programme.desc: The joints are the first parts of the body to react badly to stress, therefore it is essential to relax and relieve them as often as possible. programme.title: Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.desc: The call of the Forest is about discovering places but above all it is about meeting those who protect this priceless heritage. Forests are essential to mankind. They capture CO2, promote the formation of clouds and therefore rain, protect the soil from erosion and provide a habitat for wildlife. From Madagascar, to France, to Cameroon, or even Eritrea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand sets out to discover the most beautiful forests, those who live in them, those who protect them and those who live off them.

programme.title: The cheese menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The cheese menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie sets on the roads of France to talk about an essential product on French tables: cheese. More than a gourmet craze, more than an end-of-meal treat, cheese is associated with French gastronomy, and is also recognized as Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. With nearly 1,000 varieties (soft cheeses, cooked, blue-veined, pressed cheeses…), the French are the biggest consumers of cheese in the world!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Martial Arts and meditation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Martial Arts and meditation
programme.desc: Today, we will meet in Santa Monica in the hub of the last healthy trends. Val will make us discover Erewhon, the biggest organic and hipster supermarket in Los Angeles. She will then meet Troy, a guru of healthy consciousness, for an outdoor class that mixes martial arts and meditation. Then, on the legendary "Muscle Beach", the beach of all athletes, we will meet David, an action movie double, for a very aerial workout.

programme.title: Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.desc: Val takes us to discover Palm Springs, the trendy and designer city in the heart of the California desert. In the heart of a private collection, we will discover all the flora of this region: an outdoor plant museum, one of the largest collections of cacti, and even tequila flowers. Then well head to the Paseo Hotel, one of the zen and design hotels of Palm Springs, where well meet the chef of the restaurant who will concoct his signature dishes. We will end our day with a relaxing massage with crystals.

programme.title: Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.desc: We meet again in the market garden of Romainville, for a special Halloween episode. In one of our first episodes, we learned how to sow a pumpkin seed. The pumpkins, which I had installed in my vegetable garden, have grown well now that we are in autumn. And thats good because today were going to show you how to dig a pumpkin to make a beautiful Halloween lantern.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare a creamy, comforting cauliflower and celeriac veloute. This mild, delicate soup is spiced up with condiments like paprika, garlic and oregano, and a touch of olive oil for an even more gourmet texture. An ideal dish for a light starter or a warming dinner.

programme.title: Paul John Elliott
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Paul John Elliott
programme.desc: Without really knowing why, Paul Elliott will change his life from cartoonist to massage therapist. Aspired by success, money, success, he will create several clinics and will eventually lose the human aspects and lose himself. A new turn, a new meeting and Paul will finally resume his dreams of painting. Follow Paul in his tumults and his happiness found.

programme.title: Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.desc: They are beautiful sisters, they are passionate about nature and they have a very strong common point: entrepreneurship. After years of evolution in consumer sectors, discover Annabelle and Valerie who knew how to listen to their passion to create a fitness and surf club (for Annabelle) and a zero waste grocery store (for Valerie).

programme.title: Véronick Desmarais
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Véronick Desmarais
programme.desc: The everyday work is not always easy and it is sometimes difficult to get by. If there is one thing that Veronick has learned from her experience and those around her, it is because she is able to surpass that and to embark on her dreams and plans to become a massage therapist. You will believe in your abilities too.

programme.title: Violaine Courtois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Violaine Courtois
programme.desc: Everything started from the dream of her parents, she becomes a veterinarian. In her career that she launched backwards, Violaine will meet people who will take her to a different path of life. The chance will be at the rendezvous but it is especially the courage to resume studies and create his company that will build his project. Follow the encounters and travels of Violaine that brought her to fasciatherapy and nonviolent communication.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.desc: The incredible diversity of flora and fauna, the fight against climate change, the balance between growth and sustainable development: these are all battles being fought on five continents. Yann Arthus-Bertrand takes us on this expedition. Were off to Gabon to discover the Ivindo National Park and Port-Gentil, then on to Sri Lanka in Kandi. Back to Gabon we go to Libreville, then Lambarene to talk about turtles and the health of the local people. Finally, off to Dhaka-Bangladesh.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Lower body relaxation
programme.desc: This exercise aims to release all the tension you can feel in your legs and feet. Then, with a series of muscle contractions and decontractions, you will deeply relax your legs and feet. Youll notice youll feel much better overall.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 1
programme.desc: How can we reconcile the development needed to sustain the lives of nearly seven billion people with the protection of the Earths natural resources? Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team have chosen Gabon to continue their survey of the planet. Well be discovering the Kongou Falls, the Langoue clearing with their elephant in Gabon. Then in Colombia, we will go on the island of Malpelo with their shark. Back to Gabon we will discover the Minkebe National Park and the bats in Franceville. We will also go to India in Hyderabad, which has convinced farmers to use no pesticides and no GMOs in their cultivation.

programme.title: Citrus flavors
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Citrus flavors
programme.desc: Julie takes you through the Pyrenees Orientales, then Corsica, before making a stop on the Côte dAzur, and concludes her journey between Rungis and Paris... all to explore the world of citrus fruits! These fruits add flavor, zest, and seasoning to any recipe, making them indispensable in the kitchen. They bring the warmth and sunshine of the South of France and the exoticism of distant lands. While were all familiar with lemons, clementines, and grapefruits, Julie introduces us to a thousand other varieties.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Topanga Canyon, AMBA Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Topanga Canyon, AMBA Yoga
programme.desc: Val goes to the heart of Topanga Canyon, California, a favorite spot for yoga addicts and nature lovers. Here she will experience AMBA Yoga, a kind of hollistic yoga for women. We will also attend a Sound Bowl session, a Tibetan practice considered the ultimate in meditation. In the heart of Venice Beach, we will discover the "Plant Lab", a new high-tech application that records the vibrations of plants to create music. Finally, Val will present us the largest concept store of rare crystals in South America.

programme.title: Hot Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hot Springs
programme.desc: Still in Palm Springs, we will discover the Parker Hotel, the most trendy and design hotel in town. A French chef will take us to cook in the middle of nature. Then, Val will go to Desert Springs, a town known for its natural hot springs. At one of the many spas in town, Val will test one of the springs and even attend a Sound Bowl session.

programme.title: Growing mushrooms at home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Growing mushrooms at home
programme.desc: We meet at the Romainville market garden centre to learn how to grow mushrooms at home. Some varieties, such as button mushrooms, oyster mushrooms or shiitake mushrooms, grow quite easily in mushroom houses. But you too can do it. And today we will show you how to make a miniature version of this kit to grow oyster mushrooms at home.

programme.title: Mashed potatoes with vegetable gravy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Mashed potatoes with vegetable gravy
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare mashed potatoes in vegetable stock. The mashed potatoes are soft and melt-in-the-mouth, while the richly flavored broth of bell bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, celeriac and tomato enhances the whole.

programme.title: Sweet potato bruschetta
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Sweet potato bruschetta
programme.desc: In this recipe, we reinvent the classic bruschetta by replacing the bread with a roasted sweet potato base. Garnished with tomatoes, guacamole, chilli pepper and a drizzle of olive oil, this healthy and tasty bruschetta is perfect for an aperitif or a light starter.

programme.title: Carine (Nice)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Carine (Nice)
programme.desc: After twenty years as a lawyer, Carine decided to give in to her desire to help others heal. Her inner journey led her to discover a passion for naturopathy as she rediscovered her love for nature and learned the healing qualities of the plants around her. Combined with a deep understanding of astrology and nutrition, she is now able to help others live better and find their own path.

programme.title: Virginie (Lyon)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Virginie (Lyon)
programme.desc: Virginie’s beautiful handwritten lettering decorates the walls and windows of many shops in and around Lyon, France, as she lives out her passion of finding beauty in every stroke. A former waitress, Virginie was struggling to find her calling when she suffered a life-altering horse accident that almost left her handicapped. At only 30, she was forced to put her whole life into perspective. She finally found herself through a love for graphic design and lettering, combined with a desire for freedom that came with working independently. To motivate other women, she has also launched “Ladyboss”, a network of inspiring women entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Laetitia (French Alps)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Laetitia (French Alps)
programme.desc: While pregnant with her daughter, Laetitia, a former journalist, experienced a strong desire to change lifestyles and move to the countryside. Remembering the teachings of her grandmother, she began to venture outdoors into the surrounding Alps and study the different plants at her fingertips. Today she holds a wealth of knowledge about the medicinal and aromatherapeutic value of plants that she applies to making natural products. With utmost respect for the environment, Laetitia gathers only what she needs in order to make herbal infusions.

programme.title: Louise (Oleron Island)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Louise (Oleron Island)
programme.desc: At only 20 years old, Louise is full of confidence and already achieved a personal dream of hers to share her passion for nutritious and locally-sourced ingredients on the island of Oleron, France. Repurposing a camping car, she set up a brunch and tea-time spot where the guests can hand-pick their ingredients in the adjacent organic fields. Louise transforms the ingredients into favourite creations of hers and even joins her father for boat trips when she needs to stock up on fresh fish for the menu!

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 1
programme.desc: In this instalment, Yann Arthus-Bertrand lifts the veil on the products people buy. Almost everything we buy has a direct impact on our environment. We head to Japan to talk about the impact of new technologies, then to the Republic of Congo in Bukavu for the coltan harvest. How does our total consumption affect the environment? What permanent brands are we imposing on our planet? How can we differentiate between useful and useless purchases?

programme.title: Autoliner

programme.title: Crystal Serenity

programme.title: USS New York

programme.title: Extreme Construction: Cruise Ships

programme.title: Thunder Boat

programme.title: High Tech and Manual Work

programme.title: MV Stornes

programme.title: Northern Eagle

programme.title: Neptune

programme.title: Paul Gauguin

programme.title: Viking Sea

programme.title: Orbis
programme.desc: ORBIS DC-10 now serves as a flying eye hospital, bringing vision care to developing nations.

programme.title: Martin Mars
programme.desc: Martin Mars water bomber heads to Mexico for toughest mission over fire-ravaged mountains.

programme.title: Antonov AN-225

programme.title: From Lumber to Lodgings
programme.desc: A house is built from tree to furnished home in just 2 days, a prefab construction done in record time

programme.title: A Breezy Challenge
programme.desc: A colossal offshore wind farm rises in record time 80 turbines installed (one per day) in harsh North Sea conditions

programme.title: Emergency Helicopters
programme.desc: Inside Airbus Bavaria, see how lifesaving H145 rescue helicopters take flight.

programme.title: Harvesting Giants
programme.desc: Meet the mighty Fendt tractors built in Germany, power, precision, and pure muscle.

programme.title: Superyachts

programme.title: Mining Truck
programme.desc: In Canada, transporting a 360-tonne mining vehicle is key to protecting road infrastructure.

programme.title: Living Big
programme.desc: Technique, technology, and ambition have developed some of the most magnificent structures.

programme.title: Travelling Big
programme.desc: The human race is constantly looking for a better way to get from point A to point B.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro (CAN)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary" - Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro (CAN)

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 1
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 2
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Bouldern and Climbing 2013
programme.desc: Highball bouldering in Switzerland’s Ticino and the redpoint ascent of the “Rote Wand” in /VorarlbergAustria. Beside adrenaline packed action this is also a story of trust and friendship as well as responsibility for yourself.

programme.title: Episode 40
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 40

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn Pro (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 2
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup - Skateboard Festival - Prague (CZE)
programme.desc: It is the 25th edition of the legendary Mystic Sk8 Cup. We are on the Prague island of Štvanice and a three-day skate festival awaits. We look forward to street and bowl competitions with prize money of CZK 800,000 and skateboarders from more than 22 countries.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs - Sibiu (ROM)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Hard Enduro Rally was launched in 2004 and has become the toughest hard enduro rally in the world, attracting participants from around 50 countries every year. The race promises five days of pure hard enduro racing action

programme.title: Verbier E-Bike Festival 2019 - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The breathtaking Alpine landscape will attract riders of all levels to the first Verbier E-Bike Festival in Switzerland. Willpower, endurance and riding skills are put to the test on strenuous climbs and technically demanding descents

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsportsteam 2015 - Mountainsports: Climbing and Unicycling
programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Burser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Go Big or Go Home - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: Go big or go home - in search of the perfect waveadidas Outdoorsportsteam: Nick Troutman, Mat Dumoulin, Gerd Serrasolses and Peter CsonkaNo distance is too great for these four athletes - their quest takes them and their kayaks from Africa to North America.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam - Stikine River and Place of Happiness
programme.desc: Outdoor Sports Team 2014:Stikine River: Kayaking the Grand Canyon of the Stikine River (British Columbia, CAN / Alaskan Panhandle, USA) A place of happiness: Athletes Mayan Smith-Gobat (NZL) and Ben Rueck (USA) explore the highest monolith in Brazil.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 40

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the worlds largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show Skate
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the worlds largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 2
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the worlds best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: Episode 40
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 40

programme.title: WOF 2025 #09: Asics Saintelyon
programme.desc: The Asics SainteLyon is a legendary nocturnal ultramarathon in France that takes place on the route from Saint-Étienne to Lyon. The 2025 edition is scheduled for November 29 and 30 and promises to be an unforgettable experience for everyone involved.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #10: World Rookie Tour - 20 Years Anniversary Documentary
programme.desc: Launched in 2005, the World Rookie Tour (WRT) is the largest international youth action sports series dedicated to developing the next generation of professional athletes in the sports of snowboarding, freeskiing, skateboarding and surfing.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #11: Epic Series – Season Preview
programme.desc: Today we take you on an exciting journey. Get ready for an exclusive preview of the Absa Cape Epic and the Epic Series 2025 - the ultimate test of endurance, skill and teamwork.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #12: Mediterranean Epic by Scott 2025
programme.desc: February 6-9, 2025, Oropesa del Mar (ESP): The Mediterranean Epic is a UCI 4-stage race where mountain bikers can enjoy mountain biking to the fullest on the course around Oropesa del Mar in the province of Castellon in Spain.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: One Water Race 2025 - Road to Compilation
programme.desc: Follow the world’s top ultra-athletes as they prepare for the ultimate endurance test – the One Water Race. This highlight reel captures the best moments from six episodes, showcasing their struggles, victories, and relentless pursuit of greatness.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #50: GKA Kitesurf World Tour Brazilian Special
programme.desc: The GKA Kitesurf World Tour 2024 will feature three spectacular stops in Brazil, highlighting the nation’s premier kitesurfing destinations. With top riders battling for championship titles, the 2024 season is set to deliver unforgettable action for fans worldwide.

programme.title: European Cricket League 2019 - La Manga (ESP)
programme.desc: ECL19 took place for the first time at La Manga Club. The national champions from Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Romania, Russia and Spain compete to be crowned the “Kings of Europe” of continental European club cricket.

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon - Solden/Ötz Valley (AUT)
programme.desc: The epic Ötztaler - probably the most demanding cycling marathon in the Alps. The race track stretches over 238 kilometers and leads from Solden over 4 Alpine passes to South Tyrol and back again. The participants climb an incredible 5,500 meters in altitude

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championship 2019 - Alaharma (FIN)
programme.desc: The CIK-FIA presents the latest championships, bringing together the best drivers and the greatest hopes of motorsports of the future in races of incredible intensity. The FIA ​​Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over

programme.title: Mammut Swiss Irontrail 2013
programme.desc: The spectacular Swiss Alpine region of Graubunden is the setting for one of the toughest ultra trail races in Europe. This event truly embodies the essence of mountain running with breathtaking views - this is the Swiss Irontrail!

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy and Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the worlds best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: BUFF Mountain Festival 2019 - Vall de Boi (ESP)
programme.desc: The sixth edition of the BUFF Epic Trail attracted nearly 3,000 participants from 40 different countries for the four trail running distances: 65 km; the 42 km; the 26 km and the 12 km - four races that took the athletes over extraordinary distances.

programme.title: FIA Karting Championship 2019 - Lonato (ITA)
programme.desc: The CIK-FIA presents the latest championships, bringing together the best kart drivers and motorsports brightest hopes of the future in races of incredible intensity.

programme.title: WRT Skatboard Finals - Lisbon (POR) and Swiss Epic - Grison (SUI)
programme.desc: The first edition of the World Rookie Tour Skateboarding crowns the first Skate World Rookie Champion AND mountain bike stage race/Swiss Epic: 300 teams from all over the world are taking part in this years edition

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska and Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: Kald Sòl
programme.desc: The film sheds light on the surprising resources of cold countries, and on the search for waves guided by climatic uncertainties. Samuel Redon, a young professional surfer accustomed to warm-water surfing, is about to discover a whole new world of surfing.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 2
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 1
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the worlds best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #31: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025
programme.desc: The Roth Triathlon took place again on July 6, 2025. The sporting event in this triathlon stronghold has been home to triathletes from all over the world since 1984. It consists of a 3.8 km swim, 180 km bike ride, and 42.2 km run through the Roth triathlon district.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #29: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 im italienischen Vieste. Die Windsurfer werden ihr Konnen auf dem Wasser zeigen und uns ein wenig Wassersport-Action auf dem Mittelmeer bieten.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #30: WES E-Bike World Series #1 and #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Manner und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #28: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Brasilia Classic 2023 (BRA)
programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Romance
programme.desc: 1999 the old sport of skiing had just been given new life, and Level 1 was conceived. Romance, the final chapter of annual films by Level 1, captures a modern-day Golden Age in skiing. Featuring a generation of talent that came of age in the best time to ever do it.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #13: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together some of the worlds best backcountry athletes to showcase their skills.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #14: Pierra Menta 2025
programme.desc: The Pierra Menta is one of the toughest and most prestigious ski mountaineering races in the world. Held in the French Alps, it challenges teams of two over four days with steep ascents, technical descents, and over 10,000 meters of elevation gain.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #15: Come Hell or High Water - Tibet extreme kayaking adventure
programme.desc: This week we are heading to the tibetian Hymalayans. Under the famous peaks and ridges, down in the deep valleya, lays the playground of some extreme sportsmen.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #16: GKA and GWA Season Start
programme.desc: Today we will have a look at the best Kitsurf and Wingfoil Women od the World, as they kicked off the 2025 season on the capverdian Islands.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Episode 40
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 40

programme.title: WOF 2024 #35: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: WOF 2024 #26: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: Portimao, Portugal, welcomed the worlds best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Going, Going, Gong

programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance - Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.desc: To gain eligibility to join the Junior Youth Championship, Yuya has to win 4 official duels consecutively. He ends up dueling is Michio Mokota, a cuisine Duelist with high popularity among the housewives.

programme.desc: Yuya faces a ferocious attack against Michio Mokotas Cooking Duel.

programme.title: Trapped in a Card

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre LSuperieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Scream for the Green

programme.title: Duelings Most Wanted
programme.desc: The battle between Dashin’ Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Duelings Most Wanted
programme.desc: The battle between Dashin’ Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match thats part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz whos never wrong?

programme.title: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: A Date With Fate - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuyas future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

programme.title: A Date With Fate - Part 2
programme.desc: As Yuyas battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuyas danger-filled future is becoming a reality

programme.title: For Our Tomorrows
programme.desc: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist whos been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

programme.title: Battle Between Buddies - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!

programme.title: Battle Between Buddies - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

programme.title: Challengers Assemble
programme.desc: Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out whos the best duelist in the world!

programme.title: Somethings Fishy
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allies deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: Fusion Foes
programme.desc: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institutes dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

programme.title: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gongs old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways - Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down - a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuyas days in the spotlight be done for?

programme.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya cant get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!

programme.title: Making the Cut - Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Soras one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Making the Cut - Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shays heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Soras sweet-toothed smile?

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks hes seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: A Dark Reflection
programme.desc: Yuya cant believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other... and everything in sight!

programme.title: Warped Dimensions
programme.desc: Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state! Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmates ESP and TLC make him A-OK?

programme.title: A Duel Personality
programme.desc: Yuyas opponent is Isao Kachidoki from the Ryozanpaku School in the second round of the Maiami Championship.

programme.title: Stealth Warriors
programme.desc: When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!

programme.title: Bracing for Battle
programme.desc: Declan confronts Celina and shares a story from their past that reveals a frightening future!

programme.title: Battle Fields
programme.desc: Its time for a nail biting battle royal in the ARC League Championship! With four battle zones to choose from, the action has never been more mesmerizing or the duels more dangerous!

programme.title: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: While Yuya is looking to knock the competition out cold in the Volcano Zone, the Iceberg Zone is heating up as Zuzu and Gong team up to defrost their foes

programme.title: Danger Zones
programme.desc: As the battle royal rumbles on, Yuya finds himself caught in the crossfire when he stumbles across a battle between not-so-noble Knights!

programme.title: Mark of the Monkey, Part 3
programme.desc: Luna, Torunka, and Regulus confront Zeman the Ape King, the Duel Monster spirit who has taken the Ancient Fairy Dragon captive. Meanwhile, in the human world, Devack manages to Summon "Zeman the Ape King" in his Duel against Leo.

programme.title: Mark of the Monkey, Part 4
programme.desc: After defeating Zeman the Ape King and saving Ancient Fairy Dragon, Luna arrives in the human world just in time to help her brother Leo win his Duel against Devack, who has just Summoned "Earthbound Immortal Cusillu".

programme.title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 1
programme.desc: With Devack defeated, Roman Goodwin turns Greiger into a Dark Signer. Crow, who survived the black fog, challenges Greiger to a Duel to avenge the children who disappeared in the fog.

programme.title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 2
programme.desc: Crow and Greiger continue their Duel while Yusei tries to stop it. During the Duel, Crow remembers his childhood in which he learned the importance of strategy and friendship.

programme.title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 3
programme.desc: Greiger manages to Summon "Earthbound Immortal Chacu Challhua" in his Duel against Crow, but the latter has more tricks up his sleeve.

programme.title: A Score To Settle, Part 1
programme.desc: Yusei and Kalin meet up again and prepare for their rematch. During their Duel, more details of their past as members of The Enforcers are revealed and how their group disbanded.

programme.title: A Score To Settle, Part 2
programme.desc: Yusei and Kalin continue their Duel and Kalin hopes to win against his former friend with "Earthbound Immortal Ccapac Apu". Despite this, Yusei is determined to save his friend. The powers of the Crimson Dragon enable him to call forth a new monster, "Majestic Star Dragon".

programme.title: Destiny´s Will, Part 1
programme.desc: Yusei confronts Roman at the original Ener-D Reactor and Duels him. During the Duel, Roman reveals another secret in which neither Yusei, nor his friends expected to hear.

programme.title: Destiny´s Will, Part 2
programme.desc: Roman reveals to Yusei, Trudge, Leo and Luna that he was the fifth Signer, which shocks everyone, as well as how the former fifth Signer corrupted himself and became a Dark Signer.

programme.title: Shadows of Doubt, Part 1
programme.desc: Jack finds Carly at the Hummingbird Tower. However, Jack hesitates to attack her and Carly uses a special card on Jack to make him see of what the future might be if he loses the Duel.

programme.title: Shadows of Doubt, Part 2
programme.desc: The Duel between Jack and Carly continues. When Carly seems to regain her senses, the spirit of the "Earthbound Immortal" takes control of her so that the Duel can continue. Now, Jacks only hope lies in the power of the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Truth and Consequences, Part 1
programme.desc: Akiza confronts Misty at the Lizard Tower. Meanwhile, Sayer, who survived the destruction of his Arcadia Movement Headquarters, uses his psychic powers to control Akiza so he can use her to defeat Misty.

programme.title: Obelisk Assault
programme.desc: Yuya takes on a terrifying trio from Fusion Dimension who turn their victims into cards!

programme.title: Dragons Vengeance
programme.desc: Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?

programme.title: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter whos hot on her heels! Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?

programme.title: Battlefronts
programme.desc: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimensions elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

programme.title: Fighting for Fun
programme.desc: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?

programme.title: Dueling Declan
programme.desc: When Yuya discovers Declans web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!

programme.title: Kings vs Dragons
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan’s majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 1

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear! Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?

programme.title: City Scape
programme.desc: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuyas dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

programme.title: Tops Speed
programme.desc: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

programme.title: Synchro Sector
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms… and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

programme.title: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Super Duelists
